lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello everyone, and welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons & Dragons. Tonight is going to be interesting based on where we left off last time, but before we get to all of that, let me get through tonight's announcements for you guys so we can get to the game proper. For those of you who are drinking: first shot, there you go. First and foremost, tonight's episode is brought to you by our good friends at Loot Crate!

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Loot Crate!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sam, did you want to take us away?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And so they wanted me-- I talked to some of the kids. Some of the kids are actually-- they like the show? And they asked if I could bring the bunny in a Loot Crate to pay tribute.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I do not believe you. You're not--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So it's here. Because this makes the bunny sort of part of the show. And the kids and the parents helped a little, they wrote a little something to commemorate the bunny and I'm going to read that for the kids. For the kids! What can be said about Dennis the Hopper? The bestest bunny the Little Explorer's classroom ever had, the way he always jumped left paw first, or nibbled on Olivia's Yo Gabba Gabba backpack? The way he pooped whenever Maddie picked him up. We'll miss your floppy ears, your soft fur, but most of all, your inner beauty. Love, the Little Explorers: Maddie, Olivia, Salinger, Paris, Justice, Woodley, Appalonia, DeGrass, Garvey, Barack, Sashimi, Neptune, Sevigny, Coachella, Aaliyah, Walnut, and Kevin.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To be fair, that sounds like a southern California school. Silverlake!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And now to honor their request to make the bunny part of Critical Role forever, I'm going to--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't touch it, man!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll miss you, Dennis.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How long has that chicken been sitting in that box?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hi to PETA, by the way.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fucking hell. We have these amazing Loot Crate DX boxes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go to lootcrate.com/criticalrole and use the promo code CriticalRole, one word, you get 10% off your first month of Loot Crate. Sam couldn't say that because his mouth is full of bunny. But let's go ahead and open.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The DX boxes aren't the clothes boxes, are they?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, no no. That's Loot Crate Clothes. But wait!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's actually really cool.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there Gears of War stuff in here? I thought there might be.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All about the Harry Potter blanket.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shut up!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm a Baratheon, man, this means a lot to me!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Look at this blanket, guys: Wanded, and Extremely Dangerous.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's going to take me the whole unboxing to get it open.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Holy shit!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's a Witcher Wild Hunt medallion paperweight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need more of these medallions, by the way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is that an Eye of Acomodo for my shirt?!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's the Harry Potter thing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a Hogwarts book clip.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're slowly becoming more and more your character.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, he talks just like this!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is not kidding around, this is kind of intense!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does that go on your car, what is that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a paperweight. You could brain somebody with this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This will be a murder weapon in some case over the next year.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is so legit!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a bottle opener right there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Since 1963, drawing what acid does to your brain.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thanks, Loot Crate!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is my further transformation to actually becoming Melisandre in School of Thrones.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did we show this yet?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, if anyone doesn't know, Matt produced, and I helped him in it, we were in this web series called School of Thrones, like four years ago. You make a cameo in it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I have a cameo in it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's ridiculous.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's basically Game of Thrones in a John Hughes film. Just watch it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Watch it!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I really like this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm stealing some of this stuff.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm a Slytherin prefect, you need to go to bed, Mr. Mercer. I apparently have an accent for some reason.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Guys, I'm going to keep the box in case the preschool's parrot dies.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, you going to start a pet cemetery?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (air horn)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow. That's so appropriate.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's my butt!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unless it's really funny.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sound the horns.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's like telling a kid he can choose his own punishment, it's dangerous. Also, we're helping support the amazing charity, Worldbuilders, with Patrick Rothfuss and a number of other great authors. You can find out more at worldbuilders.org. They bring the power of readers and writers and all that type of creativity together, to raise money to help make the world a better place. Go check it out, it's a wonderful group and we'll hopefully be doing more things with them coming up in the near future. Those announcements will come as we go forward, but Patrick Rothfuss, who's a friend of the show, was a guest on Critical Role--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not really very familiar with Patrick Rothfuss--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You should read some of his stuff, it's pretty good, he's a good writer. And apparently is now making a show with Lin-Manuel.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I hear they're besties. He's actually my new bestie.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's right, yeah, you got a cool ring.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, he gave me a ring, yeah. My new best friend.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He put a ring on it?!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It is the six degrees of Lin-Manuel now, isn't it? Kevin Bacon has been unthroned.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're all slowly making our way towards getting him on the show. That's the goal.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Lin-Manuel, on the show.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm willing to wait for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Lin-Manuel, on this show. This one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to be fun.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is the best name.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Might be showing up off screen, just to heckle people. Or more. We'll find out. All right, any other announcements?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, she's trying to keep it on the down low, but Laura doesn't have any of her dice, really. She has three sets instead of the usual ten.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I brought my bag of dice home for the holiday and then I didn't bring it--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why did you bring it home?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I maybe was going to give some of our dice to our winners for the costume contest.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But instead--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just left them at home.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have a bag of dice in there that I've never used.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have a lot of dice, I just don't have all my dice, you guys. I still have a bunch up here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She literally has 300 over here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I do, I have a lot. But thank you!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're doomed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're great. People will send us tweets being like, "Hey, do you guys still support 826LA?" Always, I don't think you can stop supporting 826LA.

lines.name: TALIESIN, MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know, they know what they did.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And they have their own shop also, and if you're interested you can go and shop at 826, and they have super cool posters and books. And buttons, and all sorts of stuff that you can get that they put out that are super super cool.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I've seen people take you up on your suggestion that it's always a great date place.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It is such a good date place.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We've had people tweet at us and be like, we took you up on that, and it is a good date place, because they have cute store fronts, so you should go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. The actual quality of the date is not guaranteed, but the quality of the venue--

lines.name: MARISHA, TALIESIN
lines.text: No. That depends on you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And we can't help that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Could you do a wedding there if you wanted to?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A very small one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or a bar mitzvah, or maybe a bris?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A very small wedding, or a wedding with small people.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Party!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Upon arriving with two charges of yours, two previously enslaved celestial-blooded boys that you found in the City of Brass, you all traveled across the planes, with the help of Keyleth, back to Fort Daxio to find the landscape scarred with recent flame and apparently a battle raging at the outer gate. That is where we left off. So, you guys, looking northward, you can see the large plumes of black smoke billowing up from the direction of the fort. The outer wall seems to have sustained some damage. You can see a number of flying entities swooping in. Dozens of them, while you can hear the distant sound of combat, shouts and battle. You guys, as you land and realize this, you can see the two slaves, who have now been freed and taken with you, both look immediately wide eyed and freaked out and closed off. What are you guys doing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So much safer here, kids.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need to get them safe.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who safe? The place is on fire. They're not safe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I take off on my broom and fly up in the air.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ah! Wait! You forgot your hat!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to see up and over the wall and see what's going on on the inside.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you fly up and head up over the front wall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't want to go in, I just want to look.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. So you fly up and get a vantage point to see what's going on over the wall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're going to get seen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you crest up in the air, you notice that there are a number of soldiers currently battling possibly a hundred or more lizard men that have swarmed into the fort, as well as a number of-- and go ahead and make a perception check actually to see if you can make some good detailed elements out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: First roll of the night.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: First roll, first roll, first roll. Here we go. 27.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 27. All right. These are wyvern riders. This is a group of wyvern riders, with lizard men, that have swooped in. You can see a number of the siege elements that have been built by Percy over there, some have been firing off on the inside or at least ones that were installed in the actual fort base. You also see a distant explosion, a flash of light on one of the walls on the inside. There is the outer wall, and there is a courtyard in the actual fortress itself. The front gates to the inner courtyard have already been breached, and most of the battle is happening inside the main courtyard.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are we outside the courtyard or inside?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're noticing this, you watch as two wyverns are now swooping in your direction from the outside of the outer wall.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because they saw you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So we're on the outside of the wall?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are far south, probably a good quarter-mile south of the fort, on the outside of the wall.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I say we starting making our way and deal with this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. I draw-- are they close enough to shoot them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're a little bit out of your range right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it possible they're out of Bad News' range or is that even humanly possible?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know what, as of right now, you could probably hit one of them with Bad News.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. I double check. Speak now or forever hold your peace, I'm doing this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the long range on it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You bear down and you--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 1,200 feet. 1,200 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Go for it. And Laura, you still have to wait at this point. You're readying your shot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. But I Hunter's Mark one of them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Aiming for--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh wait, it's probably a ranged thing too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's okay. You're currently selecting a wyvern or the rider to fire at?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The rider.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. Taking a shot. Oh, that'll do! 30.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The explosion from the front of the muzzle of Bad News fires off, the spark and flame and smoke billowing forth. The shot has no impact. It looks like, from gauging at this distance, it was just outside of the range.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, they're 1,200 feet away, they're that far?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's hard to gauge really, at that distance, whether or not they were there, but apparently the bullet lost momentum by the time it reached their position.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. Reload.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's move in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I shout down and yell, get the boys safe! But I don't know who I'm shouting it to, just one of you guys--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: More impassioned.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (yelling) Get the boys safe!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh my god. We have to get these boys to safety.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't die. They're good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Seriously?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually, I've got a better idea.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hand them one of the stones.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, yeah, sure. I hand them a gatestone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We will find you when it's safe.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hide in the bushes, don't go far.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or go anywhere.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They nod and they take the stone, and they start running off towards the western edge of this valley, which has the two cliffsides that come into the valley here. A lot of the nearby brush appears to have been burned on the way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, fuck. I say, try and stay unseen!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They go darting off, keeping low, and you get the sense that they're used to fleeing, so they dart off, arm in arm, rushing off towards the side of the valley wall.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So they're gone forever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have time to reload before they get close enough for her to fire, so if you want to take another shot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sure. I'll take another shot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should I hang out and wait or should we--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually, let's head as a group towards this. I say we run and we take everything that's heading towards us. I'll wait until they're close enough that I can get a good--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We all charge for the gate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you guys are all charging towards the outer gate. What are you doing, Vex? You watch the rest of your party darting--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I Message to Vex, and I say, what do you see? How many wyverns are there? Do you see any dragons?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I see any dragons?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Currently you do not see any dragons at the--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't see any dragons, but it looks like about a hundred enemies.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hundred! Is that true? I missed that one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a lot.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughing) That's more than two.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What do you sense? Do you sense dragons?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, that's going to take a minute.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'd work on that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, let's just charge in blindly! There's no cover out here, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is no cover.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's take out those fucking riders.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We have an Avengers moment. We're running. Like Guardians of the Galaxy!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's like Chariots of Fire. You're doing the wrong music.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, you know what, any movie where they run in slow motion toward something, which happens a lot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. As you guys are charging towards the blown-open gates to the outer courtyard of Fort Daxio, with Vex swooping down on her broom with the bow out, you watch as these wyvern riders come swooping down in your direction. Their claws extended, their tails and stingers out forward, they come swooping down. Go ahead and take a shot. You can take a shot as well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm taking my first shot. I'm also making it a wing shot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So I Hunter's Marked them as soon as they were close enough.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. Hunter's Mark. There's two, and a third one has joined, a little behind now. They're coming upon you. Which one do you Hunter's Mark?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The one that's biggest?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hard to gauge at this distance.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The one that's closest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, there you go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wing shot, first one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I am a third level rogue now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So I get advantage on my attack, if they haven't attacked me yet, right? If they haven't taken a turn?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I believe, looking at the specifics there--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As an assassin? At your third level, you get advantage if you get the drop, if they haven't taken a turn yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're moving?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They know you're around. This is less like they haven't acted yet. They've been acting. Every round, they've been dashing toward you. So you do not have the drop on them, as they've been making a beeline since the beginning. Apologies.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, all right. I guess I'll just have a 32 attack, then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, I want you and Percy to both roll damage on those attacks, as these are both guided at the same individual.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 21, and then-- That is awesome.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 26 points of damage, and he has to make a strength save against becoming prone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I get sneak attack on this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you would not, unfortunately.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, so it's just 21 damage, with four of lightning.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay! So, as you hear the explosion at the front of the muzzle of Bad News take off, the arrow whizzing through the air, both impacting into each side of the wyvern, you watch as one of its wings tears open. It tumbles forward, the rider thrown off its back and clutching onto its reins, flipping over the side as it corkscrews and slams into the ground about 150, 200 feet behind you, skidding across the dirt.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I didn't do Hunter's Mark damage!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: An additional three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Effectively slammed and left behind in the dust right now, it's going to have to get up and rush to try and catch up to you guys. The other two are swooping down now and have managed to get up--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I get my second attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do get your second attack, yes. You could as well, for your round.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Same thing, with a drop.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I extend my arm, with my Wand of Fireballs ready to shoot?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, actually.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 18 damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How far are they?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, they're maybe 150 feet from you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't crit on a 19 yet, do I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you ever get that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At a higher level.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket crits on a 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket's cool like that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why can't you be Trinket? We love the bear more than you, Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, I know. 32 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And the save? What's the DC, again?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I believe it's--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have to write down your DC, man.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I used to. Oh, 19. It's there, I just couldn't see.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, that does complete your round. The last one does swoop down and is going to-- You're making the loudest noise and got the most attention, so it's going to swoop in your direction, Percival. It's going to come on down, it's going to make two attacks on you, and then harry and lift up. That's with its bite. That's going to be a miss. It goes to snatch at you with its bite, and you duck out of the way. However, the stinger comes up from behind. That is a 19 to hit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That just barely hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just barely hits? Okay. As the stinger slams into your shoulder, that is ten points of piercing damage. I need you to make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One of those again, okay. Ten points of damage and a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (singing) Roll high, you blue-haired motherfucker.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's, like, blue and purple.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to do a Resolve.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, to take that saving throw again? Go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's even worse. Do I have to take the worse one for the Resolve?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's whatever you rolled the second time, I think.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I burn another Resolve, just to fuck it, because this is annoying me?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If it's like Luck, it's a no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let me double check, just a moment.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it petrify you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll find out!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so. This is your Indomitable? Not Resolve, your Indomitable. You must use the new roll.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, that's a 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A 12? No. All right, so, as the poison courses through your body, the stinger itself pulling forth, you see a bit of black-greenish liquid spill out as it pulls itself out of the wound. You suffer 24 points of poison damage as it then lifts back up out of range and is going to circle around. You guys all still running? You see Percy get hit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I take my Fireball shot?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can now. Because it was coming very close before you had the opportunity to hit, it swings up past and you can now, reaching behind, get a Fireball wand shot if you want.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will take my Fireball wand shot.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How high in the air is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point now, as it swooped past, it's about 40, 45 feet away? A safe enough distance for the Fireball to not blow up his own party.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's got a DC of 15, that wand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a no. It rolled a three. So go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I fire more than one charge, or should I have said that already?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a basic.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Never mind. So, it's 8d6, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you can do that, as it sweeps past after getting the rapid stinger into the chest.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: First gets 26, second is a 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, both hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, dagger, dagger, dagger.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's it. It's within 40 feet, you said?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, as it swoops past.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am going to Channel Divinity and use a Vow of-- oh, I can't. Can I ditch the second attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nah, you've already confirmed it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Also, Matthew, I don't know if this affects anything. I am exhausted. Does that change anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. You have one point of exhaustion, which means that your ability checks are at disadvantage. Keyleth, Grog, do you guys want to do anything while it passes overhead?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You go first.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, please, ladies first. No, I insist.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I run to Percy and I grab and pick him up and keep running, and I say, let me know if you're poisoned.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do I feel--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was a burning pain through your body, but it subsided after the original poison coursed through your body. So you fought it off sufficiently afterward.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I help him up and I say, come on! And we keep running.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you guys keep running. Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The one that Vax shot that hit the ground--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm Vex.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, whatever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that's 200 feet behind you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, it's 200 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys have been running this whole time as it went overhead and crashed into the ground behind you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, I'm good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The wyvern, however, has still found its target and turns around and on its own is swooping back towards the group of you guys. You're now about halfway towards the front gate of the keep, of Fort Daxio. You guys, both Percy and Vex, with ranged weapons, you can take your shot now as it's turning around and returning to you guys, still charging forward.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hunter's Mark!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you move your Hunter's Mark over to that guy? Go for it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. 23 damage, nice. All righty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: On the first arrow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. Second one?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That is, what, 23? Yeah. 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both hit. I was like, that's really high damage for arrows! My apologies.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Two ones in a row.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shut up! Ugh! 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13 damage?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Three ones in a row!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I guess you've got to throw those dice away! Only 900 left.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So running forward, you turn around behind, over your shoulder. You switch your actual direction of arrows you normally fire with and turn the other way. Both arrows sink into it and you see it wobble in the air. Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take, on the fall-down, I put Bad News away and I pull Animus out because it's closer now. So I can take easier pot shots at it. 31.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How many shots, can I take a full round of shots, or--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can if you want to.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll take a full round. 31. 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 26 hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And 33.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All three hit. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There we go. That's three shots, it's 17--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So much math!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm making sure I do this right because-- 24 points, 34 points, 41 points of damage plus--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not on one hit. That's all of his attacks.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Three, it's three, yeah. 41 points of damage plus ten points of psychic damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was three shots.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, so all three shots pelt it in the chest. You can see giant sections of its meaty chest blown open and it's streaking dark wyvern blood behind it. However, it's still flying. The fervor on its face as it's near death is causing it to get more intense as it swoops down toward you. Streaking out, the tail ends up curling beneath. It's going to take a shot toward you, Percy, as you were the one that most recently hit it and did the most damage. With the bite, that is a 24 to hit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, that hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And the stinger is at only a 13 to hit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That does not hit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, the stinger, seeing it coming this way, you duck out of the way. However, its giant wyvern jaws clamp down and streak across your shoulder as the momentum pulls it past, dragging it across the back. For that, you suffer ten points of piercing damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's not too bad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it comes down at that point, it's back in range for any of you melee folk that want to take a swing at it. Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I rage, and can I take a swing at Falcor, please?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you can!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay! Lovely.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We have no initiative, so I don't know who's where. Am I close enough to go after Grog?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. I'm keeping tabs because this is more of a flyby as you guys are running.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Could I make it a reckless attack, please?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, yeah. A lot of these are happening simultaneously.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nine, 22, plus two points of necrotic, 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It (screeching) and slides into two pieces that then scatter into the ground, smearing black darkness across the dry, desert floor. You guys continue to run forward. Currently, all your harrying wyverns are way too far behind and damaged or not paying attention, before you guys are just now reaching the outside of the busted Fort Daxio outer wall, where the front gates are collapsed inward and slightly burned.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was not so tough.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's a hundred more guys inside, Grog!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know, you keep saying that number, like I know what it means, so let's get it on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Grog, Grog! 100 needs three hands to make.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How many hands?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It needs--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How many?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keep running!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Keep running! Keep running!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not helpful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys all go into the front gates?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm on the broom, so I'm up and over the wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you get up over the top, immediately you see they have two large ballistae. The number of ballistae installed throughout the walls here, two of them have already been torn apart and whoever was manning them is lying on the ground, torn open and dead. But you do also see other dead lizardmen. It looks like a fight has been going on for a short time here and has been a back and forth. As you guys come into the main courtyard, you find the ground is charred with small flames that are still burning on bushes, and elements of piles of broken wood and things that were part of the encampment that just caught fire. You can see groups of lizardmen battling various soldiers, some of them still screaming and the sound of lizard-like battle cries as they charge in, slamming weapon against weapon, shield against face. This is an actual small-scale war happening inside here. It's hard to tell which side is winning. A lot of the soldiers are better-trained, but occasionally you watch as a wyvern swoops down and picks up a soldier and throws them off the side, and slams into the ground, no longer moving.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we see anyone we know?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where's Elle?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we see Allura?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perception check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on, opal dice. That's not bad! 26.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, disadvantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Disadvantage for you, buddy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, okay. 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So the two of you, as soon as you dart inside and glance over, you can see nobody that catches your familiar eye. Everyone who is in armor is in full armor. They're all in the actual Fort Daxio defense regalia and they are covered in blood, they're covered in soot and they are not paying attention to you because they are fighting for their lives right now. You can see there are a number of tents to the side, dried trees that have burnt out entirely. You can see a number of the trebuchets that you have repaired earlier that have already torn down, or at least have suffered partial damage from fire or other elements, bludgeoning.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But there doesn't seem to be any tabards from Emon, or any tabards from Syngorn or anything like that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. It looks like when this began, currently only Daxio's army was here. And is here currently.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, that still sucks. But okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You do watch and see as currently, there is no tension toward you because the battles happening right now are still happening. You see multiple soldiers gathering around wyverns that have been dragged to the ground with chain or have nets thrown over them, and soldiers are gashing, running up and slashing and stabbing as they can, while the lizardman carves its way through, and takes its spear and starts piercing out with its shield. As you look around, nothing but insanity going around. What are you guys doing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are there any clusters that look like not a lot of our soldiers around, just lizardmen? Or is it all mixed in together?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's all mixed in right now. It's a free-for-all. There's no group of lizardmen sitting around and waiting out for a target.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are there any wyverns in the sky that don't see us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are a number of wyverns scattered that are currently swooping down and being part of the chaos.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: About how many wyverns?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Currently not engaged on the ground? I'd say about seven.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I go full murderhobo status and find a group of people on the ground that need help?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, totally.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to try to get a sneak attack on one of the wyverns.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to also go for the wyverns.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to activate my spider-climbing boots and going to reload and I'm going to start walking around and pot-shotting anything on the ground that's giving trouble. If I see somebody, I'm shooting until they stop.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. There are masses of lizardmen in this area that are in the middle of the fray. As soon as you guys storm in and start making noise, making your presence know, a number of them who are waiting for a way to pierce in and get their weapons into the last of these soldiers that are fighting off, as best they can, the last stand they have here at the outside of Fort Daxio, some of them turn over their shoulders and see you and start rushing in. You guys, with ranged weapons, you go first. Go ahead and roll attacks on this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I get advantage because the wyverns don't see me, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The wyverns have not seen you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, make a stealth check, just to make sure you've made your way in carefully. They're not paying attention to you, but they may or may not see you out of their peripheral.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, yeah. The one you're aiming at has not seen you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. 33.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 33 hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am going to cast on whatever the biggest one is, and I'm going to cast Hex, which I still have. And I'm taking my first shot. 28.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 28 hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Gun jam!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Damn it!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 31. 31 on the first hit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I take five points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. What was that, the first one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 31, nice!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And the same, it's another 35 attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Before I went down, I do 15 points of damage plus four points of psychic damage before the gun jammed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 25 on the second.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it whips its head around to look at the direction it came with, this one finds the eye at front of its snout, sinks in, and it slowly, limply falls out in the air and smashes into the ground, maybe 25 feet to your right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It also would have taken six points of necrotic damage to it, so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, cool. You're aiming at the same one as her?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys (impact). This poor wyvern gets torn asunder.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Poor, my ass!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Poor your ass!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Poor Travis' ass!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tall cup of Travis' ass.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you guys doing at this point? You just have a wave of them coming at you right now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm following Grog to get his scraps.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're coming at us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you guys are still clustered together.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it a group of-- how many?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Some have swords, shields, and spears like (snarling).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Before anything crazy happens, I'm going to go ahead and pull up the Spire of Conflux and I'm going to Fireball right where they are.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As they're charging in, you watch the staff slam into the ground. As it slams into the ground, you can see at the very tip, there's a small piece of crystalline energy that begins to go from a dull greenish-blue to a bright red. And as it hits the apex of its glow, a single beam of red energy streaks forward towards them as they're all charging. What's the DC on that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 19 on the Spire?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, it's whatever her spell DC is when she cast it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Damn!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And no, none of them make it! So go ahead and roll the damage on that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, Fireball. I don't know this damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 8d6. Radius 20.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Give me two. I get to reroll ones, too, because it's fire damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I got three ones. So those will all get rerolled.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that true?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That is true.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's an ability of the Spire.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's nuts.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ten, 15, 25 points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25 points of damage?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's another six up there, the red one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: One, two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight! 25, 30 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 30 points of fire damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thanks, Sam! MATT; As you guys are getting your weapons ready, you have both your daggers out at the side. You have your axe at the batter-up position. You watch as suddenly they burst into red flame and a number of their charred, burning bodies tumble to the ground, motionless. As the fire subsides, all six have been destroyed by the blast from the Fireball.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's what we were going to do, right? Yeah! That's basically what we had in mind.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This knife does the same fucking thing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Point it towards the enemies, okay?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the chaos is still happening, you watch as another blast of flame explodes on the top tower that is the front of the fortress itself, and you hear what sounds like dual Wilhelm screams as two guys who were situated on the top, running to of the ballista, get blown off and both slam into the ground, faces and necks snapped from the impact on the floor. Looking up in that direction, you watch as another streak of bluish-green arcane energy shoots up a few hundred feet into the sky, and it (poof), as a sort of signal for them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, no, no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look up top as you see one wyvern is curling its way, perched up on the edge of it. And there, jumping onto its back, you see an elf. An elf with longish, blonde hair. Robes that are bloodied. It gets up and holds onto the reins.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How far?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point? He's probably about 80 feet from you. You guys are halfway across the courtyard to the actual fortress.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's up on the wall?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I shoot him with lightning?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to get close.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, that's a 100-foot range.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, yes. You could.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's a bad guy?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's on a wyvern, so I'm going to say maybe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I shoot him with a Bramble Shot?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About 45 feet up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to try to shoot him with a Bramble Shot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Shoot him?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's on a bad wyvern, right? This is a bad guy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For the purposes of this, guys, we're going to go ahead and roll initiative.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's a bad guy!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you don't know if he's a bad guy or not! But he's on the battlefield.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because I'm trying to tangle him up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike has been having a hard time keeping up with everyone with her tiny, short legs.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pike!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on, Pike! Come on!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm rolling really poorly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, me too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you have your snitch?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. It's just rolling poorly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want one of mine?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, no.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Take your clothes off, Taliesin, reset.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll take my clothes off. If it'll inspire us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, no. What is it? Do it, Sam!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Holy fuck!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Triple disadvantage for the night!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're dead, we're going to die.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: For the rest of the game, you've got to look at that--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh my god! Sam! Sam!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We've never seen the picture at that size. And it makes me want to Goonies-style cut a hole in the mouth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No one should ever say, "I want to cut a hole in the mouth of a picture of you." I do want to say that is pretty much life-size, which is really creepy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I wish I could do what Travis can do with his pecs, but I-- (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're there, you're there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With you guys on the battlefield, let's roll initiative.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: We did.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We have to do it again?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'd love to do it again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sing-song) Sorry!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was funny.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's a bad guy, right? I mean, we can kill him, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Kill him anyway. And find out later.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can also take out his ride.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we can take out the wyvern.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice. 20 to 15?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need someone to roll for Pike, by the way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Eight. I don't know what Pike's initiative is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So 15 to ten?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 13. Oh, go ahead.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't have my sword working.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, what did you get?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Aww, you and Pike fighting together.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Top of the round, as you see this figure get onto the wyvern up top. Bloodied, grabbing on to the reins, looking over the top, Vex, you're up first.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to shoot a Bramble Shot at him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20. Hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This man, this man is an elf, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 16. And then the DC is 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 damage and DC of 16. Is it strength?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, that's a 15.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! Then he's restrained!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Does he take additional damage from the Bramble Shot?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, he takes 16 damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 total from the shot, okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 16 damage from the shot, as far as I know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's your normal arrow damage plus whatever it tells you to roll on that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I get another of my arrow damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's your arrow damage, and then that on top of it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?! I didn't know that! That's so cool!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How far is he from us at this point?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, he's--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it sneak attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He did not see you, so yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What are you restraining?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The thing on top. Hopefully he doesn't have a hold of the reins, so-- Now I've lost track. 28 damage plus the 16 from the Bramble Shot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gotcha. As you reach out and fire the arrow, you watch him glance over the wall. His eyes go wide as the arrow (impact) pierces his chest and sprouts into 20 to 25 tiny bramble-like vines that wrap around him and wrap around his body as he gets pushed back and falls off the back of the wyvern, out of sight. Make a perception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. 21?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you see his expression as he falls back, it jogs your memory a little bit. You do recognize him. This is Gatekeeper Xanthas. He was the gatekeeper at the Traverse Junction in the Emon Alabaster Lyceum, the place that had the Teleportation Circles, the guy who was always at the desk waiting for you every time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that guy! That was annoyed with us every time we--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He hated us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He was annoyed with you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He hated us. What's his name?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Xanthas. Gatekeeper Xanthas. You watch him just get thrown off the back of the wyvern, slammed past, out of sight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, wonder why we hated him, we can't remember his name, Seeker Xanthas.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Huh, why is he here? Odd.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, if he's from Emon, and Emon is currently under Thordak's reign--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, he's probably working for him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think we should trust him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should definitely trust him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's currently a veggie burrito at the moment, let's keep him that way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should I fly towards him?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I dunno. Why are you asking--?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to fly. I'm going to try get towards him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm having my own problem.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, at full speed on your broom, broom speed is what again? It should be on the broom.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't have a broom paper. I never got a broom paper because I kind of stole it. It wasn't given to me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm sure it does have one. I'll look it up right now, but you need to keep in mind what your movement is on your broom.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think it's like 120.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How far away is he? It's that much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's like, ten

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's 40. I'm saying it's 40.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. It's, I'd say, 50.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Flying speed: 50 feet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't raise your hand like you got it right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I did! I said 50, right before he said it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, you also said ten, 120, 180 and 50.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's playing Rock-Paper-Scissors and going-- Got it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you rush in on the broom and look over, the wyvern still has its claws up on the edge of the walls, (snarls), looking around. You can see it's taken a few hits, a few arrows sticking out of it. However, from the explosion that happened, the two ballistae up there don't appear to be damaged. But you have no current view of Xanthas.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, that ending your turn, that brings us to Vax.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Jeez. How far away is that little rock right at the bottom of that platform that you've got Vex on? How far is that from me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That rock? It's about maybe 40 feet?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And how high is the wall?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Up here? Probably about 30 feet tall.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Do I see any wood or anything, a barrel or anything besides stone sticking out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. Not in that rock, no. It's a piece of stone that's sticking out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am going to hold everything until the rest of the party goes this round.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Keyleth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Is there anyone else coming at us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Currently, no.There are a number of the wyvern riders and-- going to place these guys over here so I go and do that-- You do see lizardmen off to the side that are in the middle of a struggle. A soldier over there, and a number of lizardmen that are currently bashing at the front gates, trying to get through the main door into the--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Where did you say where the wyvern riders were, again? Roughly, in the air?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have three that are on the ground right now that have nets thrown over them or chains pulled across, holding them down. And there are a number that are high up in the air right now, circling, looking for a way to swoop down and grab somebody. A few have their eyes on Vex.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are they clustering together?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're maybe 40 feet apart right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, yeah? They're each 40 feet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the least.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck. Okay, you know what? And how far away am I from them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From the closest one to you? About 80 feet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jesus.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have to start moving in a direction.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Towards the door, right? And then try to get the--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was going to try and get these guys out, but okay. How many are busting through the door? How many lizardmen?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And there are a few that are moving off in this direction to go join them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To bust through. Those are bad guys?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. They're currently slamming into the door and hitting it and trying to find their way through.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, let's Fireball them again. That was fun!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Will it set the gate on fire?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not if you place it right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From what you can tell and what you remember, the gate itself is mostly stone and iron.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So let's blow that shit up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So keep track of the charges you're using. They all fail.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can see both of them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They all fail?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, they all fail. Rolling nothing tonight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I have another eight. All of them? All six of them? I'm drunk with power. It's 6d8?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, 8d6.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 8d6! (counts)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Reroll.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I get to reroll ones.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Cocked.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's also cocked. That one bumped it from what it was--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was a four.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was a four, okay. So six, ten, 18, 20, five, 30 again. No, 31!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 31. (explosion) This one seed of arcane red energy that shoots forth from the staff slams into the door, and you watch as they're all thrown backwards, screaming through the air, the blast incinerating their bodies and scattering them to the four winds.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fucking shit, Keyleth!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fire walk with me, Red.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I feel like this thing should come with a child warning. Oh, jeez.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait, that smoked all of them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All of those there, yeah. You see groups of wyvern riders that are currently fighting off the guards. Keyleth, do you want to move or are you staying there?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We were all running towards the door, right? We're all trying to get in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's up to you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're all trying to get in?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm heading that way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I start heading that way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why'd you say it so nonchalant?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, oh no!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's always like it's a bad idea.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm asking if you'd-- Vax stayed there. Up to you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, he held his turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yep. I can't do anything now. I have to wait until everyone's done.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You are staying here. All right, ends Keyleth's turn, Percival, what are you doing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to use my action to try and clear my gun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Tinkering check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Tinkering check, so that's nice. It's 18! It's fine!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You get the gun to function.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I take six steps forward.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (sings) I take six steps back.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And then I use my bonus action...

lines.name: LIAM, LAURA, SAM
lines.text: (singing) We go together because--

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: (singing) --opposites attract! And you know--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not your turn, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to use my bonus action to move my Hex to one of the wyverns that is currently under the net.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right here? The wyvern or the rider?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The wyvern. Yeah. It's fighting everybody too, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. It's thrashing about.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, it's going to make life easier for everybody.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cool. So that finishes your round then, Percy. Scanlan, now it's your turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! I'll move forward with the rest of the gang, if I can. I don't know. I'll Lightning Bolt the wyvern up there who was holding the elf. Not knowing what he is or if he's good or bad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're rushing forward on your tiny, gnome feet, arm out in front, release a bolt of energy that slams into the front of the edge of the tower itself. And as you coast it upward, it burns a dark spot across the stonework before slamming into the wyvern itself. The wyvern tries to dodge out of the way. What is the DC on that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That would be 19, since I didn't call it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (sings) That's true.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sings) That's true. (speaking) No, it does not succeed!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It has no dex bonus, so it's a straight 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I will also inspire Vax with a dirty limerick.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Give it to me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So, this is a random-- There was a young lady named Spruce/ whose favorite thrill was a goose/ Just the sight of a thumb/ made her tuchus all numb/ and her bowels got excited and loose.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh god! (groans in disgust)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why? Why?!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where did you? Where?! What?!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let that story inspire you, Vax! Don't be loose like her bowels! Be firm like a mighty oak! (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I stand a full inch taller now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do. And take your d12 inspiration die.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is not what this book was meant for!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: His ability to weaponize things--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to get a volume for next Christmas.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. And with that, ending your turn, the wyvern up at the top swoops down, right up to you, Scanlan. Mouth open, stinger out to the side.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll Cutting Words this one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The stinger, however (whoosh).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh wait! No, no. That hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You have a plus two.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I think I only have a plus two if I-- No, I think it's a straight 14 because I don't wear anything anymore.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's true, you didn't-- All right, so.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You took off

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If you have the armor on, it doesn't have to be attuned, you still get some--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think I'm at 12, plus the armor that I'm wearing is plus two, so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So it's 14. That does hit you exactly, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But I said I was going to Cutting Words it, which probably should help.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. So go ahead and--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight. Okay. The bite goes to clamp down, and as you--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! As I look at him, I-- shit! I-- Ah! I just show him my chest hair. I tuft it out into a quick little ponytail.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The wyvern pulls back its head, confused, and the jaw snaps shut as it rears, its wings out, strangely. Its tail comes back, angrily. How many bardic inspiration die have you spent since your last battle, by the way?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I only spent one on the last battle. I did a bunch of reactions last battle, but I only used one inspiration last battle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. Cutting Words also uses a bardic inspiration, I believe--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, it does? Then this is five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I believe... Let me check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I used three Cutting Words last time, and one inspiration.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you have to use your bardic inspiration dice. So that's five.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So this is five. And I think I have six total? No?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get as many as your wisdom modifier-- I'm sorry, your charisma modifier.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's six. So yeah, I have one more.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The tail whips past your head, no impact.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're just so teeny, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I am.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike's turn! Pike rushing forward as (panting). Looking around, who here looks pretty rough, if anybody?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm a little rough, I could use some love.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I could use some love.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, either of us. I'm a little lower than you. But you're--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm running with Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. We're together.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If she wants to give us a group hug?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, she can only get up to you right now, Keyleth, at the moment.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because of her stumpy legs.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Stumpy legs.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're slender and fabulous! All right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. They're muscular. Svelte.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Monster calves.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's going to use her 3rd-level Cure Wounds on you, Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aw, thanks, Pike!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends Pike's turn. Grog, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! So, I'll run up, because

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Reckless Attack. Great Weapon Master.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Frenzy. Rage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All of it. (growling) All of it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's not frenzied yet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 28 minus five is 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How'd you do that, Grog?!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shhh!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Doing the math?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 25 plus ten is 35.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Second strike, you want to do it? As you rush and slam the axe into its side, it buries a good three inches into the chest, and as it's pulled back, its tail is still recoiling from the attack on Scanlan. Looks back to you and you see its attention's geared on you, but it's pretty rough.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pretty rough? Yeah! I just want to finish off this little meat popsicle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go for it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Same thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 28. As you pull the axe out this time, as it's rearing back and looking angrily at you, you chuckle to yourself as you throw the axe up in the air. It spins once and you catch it, and you jam it right in the center of its skull. It goes from rearing angrily to lights out. And it hits the ground instantaneously, collapsing into a heap as you wedge the blade out from the center of its forehead.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Amazing. Can I use my--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You still have about 20 feet of movement, by the way.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I-- Yeah. I'll move towards the group on the left.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That side?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't you get an attack again if you killed something?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh! Oh! Yes! Thank you! Very good point! With my bloodaxe, if I kill a creature, I gain ten temporary hit points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. So you now have ten temporary hit points on top of what you had.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Beautiful. And I don't think I get another hit. It's only criticals that I--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! Okay. Well, still.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But still, yeah, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So that ends your turn, Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's the end of the round.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do I have a go? Do I get to go?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's right. You held to wait until everybody else has a go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Question: can I call out, Vex! Catch!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Huh?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And softball-pitch Whisper up to her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you-- go ahead and roll an attack roll.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It just stabs me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure. 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 26. Okay. As the dagger whips up past you, you look down and see the thrown dagger. Do you want to try and catch it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go ahead and make a dexterity check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This should be pretty good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where's my thing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This does involve me. Can I use my Luck for her to re-roll that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, unfortunately. You reach out and catch the blade and it cuts across your hand a little bit. Which at that point, if you want to--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Bamf!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As your turn to travel with it, it's the damage that needs to happen, it's the impact. So you do take four points of piercing damage, as you try and catch it from the front of the blade in your hand, and the speed at which it's thrown is-- you feel the impact--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then I brace the broom to catch him--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point, the blade, all of a sudden, swirls with dark, shadow energy and your brother appears at your side.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I would like to use my bonus action to cast Lay on Hands and give her four hit points.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Aww, buddy! (laughs) That's so great.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's it, just four. I get to choose how many

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thanks! I catch him on the broom and hand him the--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I'll use my movement to scooch my uncomfortable crotch onto this stick you ride all over the place. (groans)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Your movement is now, on the broom, reduced to 20 feet, with two people on it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Cool.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What are you going to do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point, you see the wyverns and the riders start thrashing about. Some of them have spears that're jamming out from the middle of the net. You watch as this guy spins around and takes out three out of the guards that all just collapse to the ground. One takes a stinger to the face, another one gets bitten and has its head broken in the process, while a third one gets a spear to the front of the chest.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This wyvern asshole did that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over here, yeah. He's hurt, but he's been taking out a lot of the guards along the way. The rest of these lizard guards do a full double dash this way past that guard there, who's giving chase. These guys all rush up to try and make their way to the front door again. They can't really do anything yet to the door, but they can get there. At this point in time--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh boy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vex, Vax.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From your vantage point, up at the top on the broom, you hear this distant echoing horn sound, this (low horn noise).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's echoing through the valley. You glance over your shoulder and you see a bead of burning red light making its way in your direction. Wings flapping. It's closer than you think, and as it comes closer and closer towards you--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thordak comes and kills us all, right?!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, this is-- Happy 2016!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You feel the blood rush from your face as your immediate instinct is, "Oh god. The Cinder "King is here." While there are flames involved, the size is not as immense as you would expect from Thordak. Instead what you see is a large, red, winged bird with flames trailing off the edges of its wings flapping in your direction, coming over the wall on the outside of the fortress. On its back you see a humanoid, but much larger than anyone of your size, armored with dark black and grayish-silver-trimmed iron armor, a giant maul in one hand, itself reddish flame-like hair. This is a fire giant, similar to the ones you encountered in the City of Brass, riding on the back of this ember-roc-type creature. As it comes cruising over the top, you hear it, holding a horn in its other hand, start shouting out, "The Cinder King calls for swift execution! I deliver "his hate with absolute strength." And it swoops into a dive toward the front side of the gate. At a full speed at this point, it coasts right beneath both of you, swinging the hammer in the air. I need both of you guys to make dexterity saving throws.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Would evasion work for this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. Well, evasion is against any spell.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Spell, that's what I thought, I just wanted to check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we get advantage for anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let me check quick. (laughs) You do not get advantage for anything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) Why, though?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But I admire you checking for any given possibility.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 16 for me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to use my last Luck.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You have inspiration.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, I do, and I can add it to that save, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Good. Oh, then I'm 29. I rolled 11 off of that. Thanks for the limerick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What'd you roll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You both manage to hold on to the broom.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you, from the impact of the hammer, do suffer 16 points of bludgeoning damage. As the bird, now in a full dive, slams in a giant fiery crash into the front two gates of the keep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How close was it to us? If it hit us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It swooped right underneath you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I do an attack of opportunity?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, because you were trying to get out of the way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To do that, you would have been fully off the broom and you would fall.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Understand, understand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it (swoosh) into this full dive, slams into the two front gates which explode into a cloud of dust, broken rock, masonry, and iron. You watch as the dust settles briefly. Now the giant is stepping off of the back of this giant flaming bird and looks around, clutching its hammer in its hand.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (yelling)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's large! That's like from a different set of action figures.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think the scale is wrong, Matt, I think you accidentally put things that are bigger than us on the map.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why is G.I. Joe so much shorter than Barbie? Damn it!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did the lizard man take damage, by the way?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually yeah, as the dust clears, the lizard men that were at the gate were all destroyed in the impact, crushed, their bones broken, and you can see one arm twitching out of the center of the rubble. The doors are currently blown open and off the hinges, there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, and then--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We need some sort of miracle here! What we need is some sort of miracle!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fresh off the airplane.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hello, everybody!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Divine Intervention!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (singing) We need a hero!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is awesome.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I've lost my voice a little bit, but you know what? Fuck it! Der-n-der!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I want a shirt that says that. "Fuck it! Der-n-der!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They'll get that in the store as soon as possible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Indeed. All righty, so, bringing us to the top. As they both stand there, the flames still emanating out from the impact, the lizardmen scattered and broken at the gate, the battle still waging on in the vicinity, you see as two other battles over here, the wyvern rider on this wyvern is stabbed in the head and is killed. The wyvern is still around, but it takes another guard out behind it. Over here, this guy continues to fight and takes out two of the guards, but there is still one behind that is holding strong. Top of the round, Vex. What do you want to do, as you just barely gather control over the broom again?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is that within range of you, to throw something at it and bamf there, or--?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ish. We'll find out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to try to fly over. Am I able to get to the roof above him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over here? Yeah, you can.

lines.name: LARUA
lines.text: Okay, I'll go there and land.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you both make your way over, landing on the roof. There you can see Xanthas is still bound by the vines, his eyes wide. He's like, "What are you doing? Release me!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to ignore him and Hunter's Mark the giant, and then try to hit him from above.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so, getting right up to the edge, arrow off to the side, go for it.
