lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 21 on the first one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21 on the first one? Hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes! And that's Hunter's Mark and sneak attack, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically, he went past you, saw you, impacted you with him-- or she did, sorry-- It is well aware where you went and knows that you-- There's no sneak attack. I'm sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Damn it! Fine, fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'd have to hide somewhere to try and get sneak attack.

lines.name: LARUA
lines.text: Oh, and that's a bonus action, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. Which you used to move your Hunter's Mark.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Which I did, yeah, so don't worry about it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vax, you're up on deck.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 18 plus four lightning damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 plus four, nice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, and then again! I attack him again!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it! One arrow--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And it definitely hits him! It's, like, 30-something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, that hits! Go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Argh. 17 plus four lightning damage!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Both arrows (impact). One slams into the armor and sticks into it about three or four inches, and you can see the giant female fire giant glances at her shoulder angrily and looks up over the top, at you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, and I want to back up away. I want to back away from the--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I will woo her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So she can't see me no more!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the full movement it would've taken you to get there, with your brother on your back, that's as far as you can get.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I crouch? Is that within my movement, to crouch?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're crouching, but you're not hiding. You do have some cover because of the edge of the wall. She sees you, but you have a little bit of cover. Vax, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is the giant within 60 feet of me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The giant may or may not be. You currently have to get over to the edge to see it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, so I'm going to move up to the edge. I'm going to use my bonus action to cast Hunter's Mark.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can't do that! That's not one of your spells!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're twins, you guys!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my god, I'm going to barf.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's from being a vengeance paladin?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vengeance paladin, yes. Level up! And then I'm going to throw Whisper at the back of her head and hope that it hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go for it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Jeebus. Let's try that again. That is-- I'm going to use--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, that's a good hit!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Mm, yeah. 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22 hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. Okay. So-- and I'm going to bamf there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. No sneak attack on this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I know. And the damage is 12 plus psychic damage is eight! 20. And then I want to use my movement, even though I can't disengage--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Did you roll your Hunter's Mark on that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, no, I-- Thanks, Mattie!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 21. Just one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Now people are going to scream "Hunter's Mark!" at

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can't wait! I love you internet! I love you so much! And then, even though I'm not using disengage, I'm going to use my movement to back the fuck up into that doorway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is 24 to hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll use Uncanny Dodge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, in order to take half damage? All righty, so, that comes to-- oof. This is going to be fun for you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So much fun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, I have the wrong dice. There we go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Guys, I have 105 hit points. I am swole.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Welcome to triple digits! Congratulations, you joined the rest of us!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take 31 bludgeoning damage, halved to 15. It-- whack!-- slams you into the shoulder. You dodge out of the way and the momentum actually hits you and the inertia shoves you into the side of the doorway. You catch yourself.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thank you! (grunting)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that ends your turn? Keyleth, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I am going to Tidal Wave these motherfuckers. Yeah! Still have that packed from the Fire Plane, what's up! So I don't have a-- do we have a laser pointer in the house?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not in your bag?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, it's funny. We bought, like, ten laser pointers, forever ago.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know, it's fine. Matt will just point at random until he finds the spot that you're looking for.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Warmer, warmer, colder, colder, warmer.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I had a laser pointer.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Here's one, here's one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, I think this is mine!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, sure it is!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Use it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tidal Wave!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, 30 feet long, ten foot wide, ten foot tall. Everything must make a dexterity save.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're trying to do it this way?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's exactly what I'm doing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so it comes bursting through. All right, they both need to make a dexterity saving throw against a DC 19, correct?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 19, yes, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yep!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a 17 for the giant, no. And that is a seven for the roc. So no, they both take 4d8 bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And they are knocked prone, and if they are flamey, then all unprotected flames are distinguished.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Extinguished.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is the creature's nature--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're very distinguished. They have little fun mustaches.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're dapper!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They both fall prone, but the nature of their flames is natural. It is part of their actual physicality, so the flames do not get extinguished.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So they don't take extra water damage? So 4d8?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see steam rise up as it impacts. The flames darken a little bit and subside briefly. Both of them are knocked off their feet into the ground as you watch the tidal wave curl up, slam into both of them, and then spill out and spread across the ground, putting out this fire here, actually.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 21 damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep, great. That finishes your turn, Keyleth, or do you want to move?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll stay where I am, actually.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That brings us to the general, as she stands.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god, she's a general!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At half of her movement there. She, extremely angry, gets up. (growls) "Oh, that's not "playing fair!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You looked like you needed a bath!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looks back at a piece of the rubble, grabs it-- actually is going to use her Flaming Anger, which is an ability she has. She gets extremely furious and tenses up. You can see muscles bulging in her forehead. She grabs a big chunk of the nearby rubble. You watch as the rubble, already on fire from the impact, the fiery impact of the site, begins to heat up. Lobs it at you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a natural one. As it goes whoosh, and tumbles past--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I watch it, be like--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It goes down over the outer wall.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Echoing from in the gate, you hear, woo!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You've got a good arm!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both hands over the head, the great maul hanging at her side, and throws it at you. This time, that is a 19 to hit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Heh, uh, yeah. That hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You suffer 33 points of bludgeoning damage from the impact, plus ten points of fire damage from the heat, as it slams into you, almost knocking you onto your back. You manage to catch yourself, but the pieces of it hit you and then break apart and fall to the ground around you. You find your whole front side charred from the impact. With the rest of her movement, is going to-- let's see, she only has 20 feet. One, two, three, four, in your direction, picking her great maul up with her hand and swinging it. Thank you, boyfriend glasses delivery. Ends the general's turn. Percy, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan, you're on deck.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She throws rocks!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, now that this is happening, I've decided-- I'm already committed to this wyvern and rider over in the corner that have not ceased to be a problem. I assume that they have not ceased to be a problem at this point.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're fighting off guards.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But they're going to become a problem if they kill those guards.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Possibly. If they kill the guards.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, that'll do! So I'm going to take three shots at that wyvern. I'm going to start shooting at the wyvern. So, first attack. He's held down by a net?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He is, but two of the guys who were holding the net have died off, so it's almost negligible at this point. He can't get the wings going, but if the net is removed or he manages to get the net off, it'll be fine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a gun jam.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yep, that's another one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How many guns you got?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got a lot, but I keep-- Ugh, god, that hurt. Okay. That really hurt. Took ten points of psychic damage, because that's funny. I'm irritated. I'm putting that away and I'm pulling out Bad News and taking a shot with Bad News at him because I've got just enough of a round to do that. Another sharpshooter shot, because I'm irritated. Come on. Oh, for fuck's sake.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you die?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I died. I'm dead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hold it away from you, just in time, as the flame backs up in the butt end of the weapon just flares outward. You can see, this is going to need a little work to get it working again.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That legit sucks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You want to move, or anything else you want to do on your turn?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh yeah, no, I am. I'm paying a deadly price for this shit right now. I'm going to run toward the-- that's some sort of bastille weapon over there? Is there a-- No, to your-- yeah, right there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there? That is a crate and a chest.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What's the thing in the circle?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, this right here, you mean? Oh, that is one of the trebuchets that you had repaired and one of the ones that isn't damaged yet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm running toward it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yeah, use the battlefield!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Press 'x' to use!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. It is loaded. It has not been used. It looks like the men that were currently fighting the wyvern across the way had loaded it up and then were assaulted when they threw the net over. So it currently is ready for use.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is a difficult thing to aim. That ends Percy's turn. Scanlan, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I will-- We need to hit this giant, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah! Kill it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So I will (sings) Bigby's Hand! But I have very few spell slots left, so it's going to have to be at level seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. 7th-level Bigby's Hand.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will punch him in his giant solar plexus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The giant?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Her! Her giant solar plexus. It's a she.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes it is.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's ten feet above your head.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. With my hand cone, if that helps.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fuck, that shirt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With your hand cone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hold the hand cone to the shirt.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, so Bigby's Hand appears, goes into a Clenched Fist. Go ahead and make a spell attack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! Because it's a melee attack-- spell attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21 hits! And so it's cast at seventh level.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, it's 8d8.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So handsome!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you have any d8s over here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I do. There's another d8.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Here's some more.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Oh wow! That's all of them. That's eight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It feels better that way. Ooh! Those are good rolls!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Those are very nice-looking d8s.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, Vax? I also need you to make a constitution saving roll.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 40! Ooh!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: For what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have a concentration check for your Hunter's Mark?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, awesome! I love-- I know all about spells! It's a one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But I have Luck, so I'm going to roll again

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go ahead.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Concentration, straight--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No-- constitution, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Constitution, straight 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know me well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've moved ten feet that way. You still have--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is anyone within range of my Healing Words?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have, looks to be Pike, Keyleth and Grog all within range.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Keyleth's hurt, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I am hurt.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. I will give her some Healing Words.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Second level?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Heal me. With your words.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. I'll take it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, 71 hit points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. That ends Scanlan's turn. All right, so. Vex, I need you to make a wisdom saving throw, if you could?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fucking dick!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Get him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a seven. As you, looking off the side, getting your arrows ready for a second round, you can hear a couple of whispers off to your side. As you glance over, you make eye contact with Xanthas, who has managed to shrug off the bramble vines around his body. As soon as he finishes talking, he points a finger towards you. And you're listening. You snap to attention.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And he goes, "Why don't you take a walk off the edge of that tower right there?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispers) Wait a second, you can't do that!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But when I'm doing it, I'm also still intelligent, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're still intelligent, oh.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, and you look good doing it. You look good walking right off that edge.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to walk off of it. I look at him, I walk off it. Can I pull out my broom as I walk off the edge and land on the broom? Because I did what he told me, technically?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so he's a--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But he didn't say to not use your broom.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just double-checking to make sure I could make him do this.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: (singing) Off the catwalk.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't think you can command someone to hurt themselves.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It doesn't say that you can't.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Really?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Each time it takes damage, it gets to retake the saving throw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Once you complete his instructions, you can do anything you want.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, that's what I mean. I'm going to walk off the edge and pull out the broom.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And just fly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you're coasting there with your broom.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I give him a thumbs-up. Thanks, Boss!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That was awesome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So now it is Pike's turn.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. So, getting up to speed here. So Percy's kind of low?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Percy!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, I'm low.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. I have on my Sprinter's Boots.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're next to me.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm next to you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And Percy's over by the trebuchet in the corner.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I make it to the trebuchet in the corner with my Sprinter's Boots or even without?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not without, you couldn't. You could, but it would take your whole turn.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, then I will use my Sprinter's Boots.

lines.name: MATT

lines.text: You take nine points of bludgeoning damage as it smacks you over the head with a giant club.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Are you okay!?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need you to make another constitution saving throw with advantage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because you're being hacked like crazy here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Another natural 20.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Shut the fuck up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The other one was a three. Three and a 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. Warcaster, man. Warcaster is a great feat. All right, that ends their turn, it is now Vex's turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, can I attack my best buddy?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who is that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Xanthas. He's my best friend.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's more of a telepathic thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Motherfuck!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know what he's referring to.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Have you been writing his name and your name in your notebook?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: With hearts around it and everything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are such a lawyer. No, for this you're going to keep taking shots at Grog.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fine!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Now, there are lots of people to choose from. She doesn't have to pick the most handsome.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey Grog, what's your AC?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why, what did you do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because I got a 26 and a 29.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you get hit. And the first one gets sneak attack damage because technically you're working on--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She just Boromir'd your ass.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh no! Not Boromir!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, are we going to die?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Boromir was my favorite.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Scanlan, run in the tent.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What, damage?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Piercing damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With the sneak attack?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Halved. Huh? Yeah, that's with the sneak attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so half of that it puts you at eight points of piercing damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then, oh, four lightning damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So four total.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's just the first attack! Oh no! I'm sorry!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Has no one noticed that she's doing this yet, by the way? No one has commented that she's doing this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, now I'm going to catch on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 20 on the second attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So ten.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So ten damage on the second plus three lightning.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so 13.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 25. I'm keeping track of this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (singing) I'm going to go because we don't get a break because we're fighting.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And stay down!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay Vax, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, I want to a little mini curve and go two squares this way and on the way I want to throw, as a bonus action, throw my Flametongue Dagger at my sister.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So she takes a total of seven points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go ahead and mark that on her sheet for her.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Minus seven awesome points. And then I want to walk up to the back of the giantess and stab her in the calf.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She has a small cow?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll damage on that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wait, is that with sneak attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ooh! What! What?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's going to be like a million points of damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're going to carve a Christmas animal out of her.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There are no numbers as high.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes. Get it. Get it! Big money, no whammies!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is a fun game.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is great.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I love Dungeons & Dragons.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We don't know the damage on the inside yet, but this is fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Plus Hunter's Mark. Shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which is also doubled, technically.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah I know. Did I-- yes I did. I forgot just my straight-up bonus that doesn't get doubled. That is 64 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How do you want to do this? (cheering)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Kill it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kill it!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I want to to walk up and jab Whisper into the back of her calf and then slide it up the back of her leg, up the ass, up the small of her back as high as I can reach. Probably around the tailbone, I don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vex, I need you to go ahead and roll a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Because I stabbed you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Roll low, roll low! Oh, I mean roll high! Roll high! Wisdom saving throw. 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 does not make it. However, technically, and this was my fault before, you do have advantage because it is a person who is not your ally. Or they're fighting your allies.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's even worse.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep, so you're still dominated. Sorry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But at least you lost some hit points.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yay...

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I saw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So that ends Vax's turn, Keyleth, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay so, I have the wyvern in my face?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do, yes. And the wyvern rider.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And the wyvern rider? I'm going to do two slam attacks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To the wyvern or the rider?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What looks worse?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The wyvern.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The wyvern, then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The wyvern rider hasn't really been hurt.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to take out the wyvern.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay go for it, roll two strikes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry, I'm the worst. Oh, plus five, okay so the first one is 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18? Hits.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And the second one is not as good. That's a 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 also hits.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They don't have a high armor class.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aw, so they each take...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They've got a fair amount of hit points for their size, but their armor class isn't huge.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay cool, so the first one is good. 13 plus five so 18 for the first hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And four plus three is seven plus five is 12. 12 for the second.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gotcha. All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have never done this before. I'm going to use a bonus action, as a Circle of the Moon druid, to use one spell slot to heal 1d8 hit points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh, seven! That's good!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's looking pretty rough. It's barely keeping itself up in the air, but it's still standing in front of you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Awesome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That ends your turn, Keyleth? All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to keep him locked down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It is not the general's turn, because the general is currently dead. Percival.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to peek out the tent, just one step. I can see that the wyvern-- I take a look at the field and I see that--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry, sorry! Sorry, Jesus!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, so that's happening, but I can see that we have a problem with Scanlan. So I'm going to take some shots at the creatures that are attacking Scanlan. I'm going to attack the wyvern, not the rider.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: First shot-- actually, you know what? I haven't tried this yet, and this could be fun. I'm going to try a piercing shot and see if I can hit the rider and the wyvern.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I will say that yes, you can, because they occupy the same space.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So, starting with the wyvern, and then-- all right. Come on, don't be an asshole. Eh, that's not terrible. 19?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19 hits. So roll also for the--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, for the rider? That's 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Also hits, so with a single shot, it shoots through the neck and actually pierces the shoulder of the rider at the same time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's sick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll damage once, and it'll go for both of them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So that's okay. That's 11 points of damage and three points of psychic damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so they both take a total of 14 points of damage. It hits them both. The rider is looking really messed up from the impact. It looks like it hit something on the neck and is now bleeding onto its chest. It looks a little dazed from the impact. The wyvern is hurt, wounded, and the other guards are still stabbing at it with their weapons. So it's not quite at death's door, but it's looking pretty--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take another double shot at the two of them. That's a 26 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits, all right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And then the second one, which jumped, is 30 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so roll damage and then they both take the next hit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Better. 15 points of normal damage, three points of psychic damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So 18 total? This time, as the wyvern rears up from the damage from the first impact, the pain causing it to put its wings out and puff up, it goes through the wing and takes out the temple of the rider. The rider is immediately killed and falls off the back.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Which means I still have one shot left.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The wyvern is now in the process of trying to get its wings up. It's realized how badly it's hurt and is going to attempt to flee.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's fucking terrible. God damn it. Again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wow! There is balance!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And another ten points of psychic damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is just balancing for the Thordak fight. It's all right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I've lost that grit point, because I burned that grit point on the bird. So, ow! Run back in the tent. God damn it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that finishes Percy's turn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And deep into the tent. Like, halfway into the tent.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just curled up and shaking.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. My Bigby's Hand is still working, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you didn't break concentration.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can move it, how far?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can move it--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Move it up to 60 feet. Is that going to get back to me in time?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To you? Yeah. You can get it to anything in the battlefield.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I want it to do a 60-foot punch on the wyvern in front of me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hadouken!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Tiger!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've done, like, 30 points of damage to myself.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh wait, I have to do a spell attack first.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've done more than that to everybody else.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 hits. Armor class is low on the wyverns.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So then, oh, it's a lot. It's already up to 26. Oh. 42.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. The wyvern begins lifting up in the air, trying to escape now. It's sitting here, whipping out. The guards are backing up, afraid to get too close. You see Scanlan concentrating. As the wyvern gets about 15 feet off the ground, Bigby's Hand swoops up, grabs it, and then plants it right onto the jagged rock behind it, piercing it--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You made wyvern juice!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It weakly goes limp against the bladed rock.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was your bonus action. You still have your action and your movement, if you like. The two guards next to you are like, "We're at your aid, sir!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I might need it. Flank me! We're going into battle!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "Flank me." I don't think that means what you think it means.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So I'll-- I still have an action, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Action and movement, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll run toward the fight. Oh wait, there's a wyvern right there, isn't there? Ooh, I don't want them to kill me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's also a wyvern on my ass.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I'll attack the wyvern next to Marisha's ass. I mean, Keyleth's ass. With another Lightning Bolt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have one more level three spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, so the wyvern makes a-- Not with a two, it doesn't. And for the rider. The rider does get a natural 20, so it does take half damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. So 8d6. I got it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's it like looking at this shirt-mare all night?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm trying not to.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, my eyes are up here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a great exercise in focus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I hate you so much. With that, the rider takes the impact of the Lightning Bolt and whips its head back around angrily. However, the wyvern beneath it gets blasted by the bolt of lightning and throws it back. The rider gets just enough back, and the wyvern falls to the ground, unconscious and slowly dying.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You got that wyvern on my ass! Thanks, man!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And then I use my movement to grab both of the guards and cower behind them. Close them like a door in front of me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you move behind them, guarding you right there. You now have two bodyguards flanking you at that moment. All right. It is Xanthas' turn, now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (groaning) I mean, he's so cool, but I mean, he sucks a little bit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's not that cool.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's the coolest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is going to be a Chain Lighting.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will use Evasion, of course.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's good, that's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let me pull it up. There we go. Sixth level. All right, so, I need Vax, Grog, and Pike to all make dexterity saving throws.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Roll so high!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Danger Sense!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ashley Johnson!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ashley Jenkins!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I didn't do too well. I only got 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, both of you fail. What did you get?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All three of you fail.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Half damage for me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What'd you have to roll to succeed?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I was just going to take my turn!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know! Well, that is 50 points.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Five zero?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five zero. 50 points of lightning damage to Pike, Vax, and Grog. It's a 6th-level spell, and he had a pretty damn high roll, actually.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I hate him!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So yeah. You take half that damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) You're alive!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, that's true!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're wearing your armor!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: If you're knocked unconscious by an attack or spell, a blast of healing flames surrounds you! You immediately regain five hit points and are lifted to your feet. All hostile creatures within 15 feet of you must make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or take fire damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This burst of flame arcs out around you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jean Grey! That's amazing!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I growl!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Xanthas then goes, "Okay!" and darts back inside.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I hate him!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He's the worst!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that brings us to Pike.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay! I sound so puny with this voice! I'm going to try my tried and true pal, Guiding Bolt! I'm going to Guiding Bolt at fifth level, right in the belly of the beast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're going to turn around to this giant, angry ember-roc and Guiding Bolt it into the stomach. All righty. Let's get over here for that assault. At fifth level, you said? All righty, that would be 8d6 radiant damage if you hit. You make a ranged spell attack. It is right up against you in a ranged format, so you're probably going to have to step back because it is ranged. Or it's disadvantage to hit. Up to you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't take a step back, he'll hit you!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Maybe he'll fail!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Would he get a strike of opportunity on her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He might. It's your call. Or take disadvantage on the strike, because it is a ranged attack.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, wait. Is it the big bird? He might have reach. It might not be out of his range.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you're still within melee with him, you'll have to step out of melee to not get the disadvantage. In doing that, he might get an attack of opportunity on you. It's not just within five feet, it's getting out of the creature's ability.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll do the disadvantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go ahead and roll twice, adding your spell attack.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Big money, no whammies.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Adding my spell attack? Okay. So, 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, roll again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, that was with disadvantage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I rolled two at the same time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, with disadvantage? That does hit, actually.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It does?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just barely. It doesn't have a high armor.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Ooh! Okay, so 8d6? Okay, so how many of these, (counting). Oh, these were bad rolls. Well, that's a-- (counting)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No break tonight, guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope, sorry. We've been off for two weeks.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do I add anything? It's just those? 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see the creature itself, its flames are starting to flicker. It looks angry, and it looks wounded. That end your turn, Pike? Are you going to move? Oh, you can bonus action with the sword toward it and attack it if you want. So go ahead and make another spell attack.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Guh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That hit, because you needed a 14.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, 1d8 plus five, if it's higher than what you last rolled.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: 1d8 plus five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, you're up next.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11? To hit?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, 11 damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically that would've had advantage, I just realized, because that's the next attack against it. So roll again.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Roll that again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll the d20 again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, because if you get a critical--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Ooh, yeah, that hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so it's fine. I was seeing if it was going to critical or not.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So another? Oh, oh, sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, because the Guiding Bolt gave advantage on the next attack, and the next attack was the sword. So the beacon fades. It is now Grog's turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Reckless, Great Weapon Master. All the lasagna. 31 minus five is 27.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, 31 minus five is 26.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It doesn't matter, it hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have to roll a 14 or higher to hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's good to know. That's a 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17 hits. That's higher than 14.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I'll do all three. 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 hits, yeah. So, all three hit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Kaboom, kaboom, ka-blow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 31? All righty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, 34?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How do you want to do this?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I hit it twice with my axe, and with the third one I pick up Pike and I use her to slice the bird open! Come on, Pikey-poo!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wielding Pike like a two-handed gnome, you drop the axe on the first two strikes, the creature stepping backward. You jump up in the air and, getting about neck-height, you swing Pike with all your strength. Pike, you feel your jowls get pulled from the g-forces of the sheer strength of the arc. What weapon are you using in the battle?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, I'm using my Mace of Disruption.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as the mace comes through, it slams into the side of the skull of the ember roc. Your hands go numb from the impact as the vibration shivers through your body. You watch as the beak and the side of the skull crack and cave inward. With a little (squeak) sound, it just falls over on the ground.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah! Grog, it felt like I did it!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You did do it! Monstah! Give me a growl!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Arrr! I'm a monstah!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was the cutest thing!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I turn around and I look up at Vex and I say, fucking cut it out!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I say, good job! I'm going to hit you in a minute!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, that's right, we still have him and her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The two soldiers that are guarding you are like, "What would you like, sir? Where are we going?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is anyone out there who wants to kill me?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right under my face.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You two go kill that guy, I'll go somewhere else!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. They both, using their full--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just killed a pit fiend.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They get all the way up to it. They don't have a chance to attack, but they're surrounding it with their weapons drawn. They're going to probably brutalize it pretty badly next round. All right. For the purposes of this round, too, you hear a sound from up in the hallway, where Xanthas was. (pained shout) You watch as Xanthas goes flying out a few feet and lands on his back. You watch as a small, brown bit of hair races across, a giant, gleaming Holy Avenger goes across the air--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes! Platinum greatsword!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who was it?! It's Kima?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She says, "Bahamut strike you down, you knife-eared son of a bitch!" The blade coming down--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Here we go. That is a 15 to hit. That hits against his armor class. And a natural 20.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Get it girl.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: End him. End him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does he need to make a constitution check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ooh, double sixes on the first one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't you wanna shoot me again?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm pretty sure. No, right now I definitely want to shoot you again.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21 points of damage on the first strike. On the critical, that is 25. Oof, that's rough. So, having to make a concentration check on both on those. The first one is a 15, succeeds on the first hit. The second one does not!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's half damage, he rolled a ten, he needed to roll 13 or higher.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was on the critical, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it was on the critical. So the concentration spell ends, you have control of your mind again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tell me it's my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: After that and Kima unloading on him, yes, it is.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, get him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How many points of damage did he take?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From that total round, with the Divine Smite from her strike, he took 62 points of damage from her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm gonna fly right above him and shoot directly down onto his face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You coast over, looking down at him on the ground. He is prone currently, so you have disadvantage on the attacks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (triumphant laughter) And Kima's standing next to him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Disadvantage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, he's prone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's prone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why do I get disadvantage because he's prone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's ranged attack, so when things are on the ground, they're a little harder--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If Kima's next to him, as a rogue, does it cancel out and she gets advantage from her ally?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't get advantage from an ally being adjacent. You get to sneak attack them if they're adjacent.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thanks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No worries.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You got this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Psh. Six-- no, 18?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits. His armor class isn't very high. He's a little mage dude.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 18, and the other one definitely hits. 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, both still hit with disadvantage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you get sneak attack--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I Hunter's Mark him because he's a fucking dick!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You do get sneak attack on the first hit because Kima is adjacent to him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, all right. 18. Where's my dice? 28 on the first hit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 28 on the first hit, nice.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He made a mistake.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He made a mistake.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 17 on the second hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17 on the second hit?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How do you want to do this? (cheering)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He was always an asshole! Always.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's right. I'm gonna say, I always thought you were a dick back in Emon. Don't fuck with me! Then I shoot him straight through the face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As he's on the ground--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He always had a crush on you! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He puts his finger up as you nock the first arrow, and he goes "Wait, I--" and the first arrow hits him in the shoulder. He's like "No, (nervous laughter) we can--" and he gets that far into the second sentence before the arrow (impact) through his face. (whimpers, trails off) And the finger goes limp as his eyes go a little dead in the face.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Slightly sad.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I turn back round and I go, sorry, Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kima looks up and you and goes, (frustrated noise) "He was mine!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see some of the wyverns, the few surviving now, are starting to scatter and head back towards Emon. It looks like the ranks have broken and the tide has definitely turned at this point. As you all begin to gather yourselves, the last lizard man on the ground over there is just being repeatedly stabbed by the guards until it's no longer moving, and bludgeoned by the air elemental that's lording over it. You begin to gather yourselves to consider the next course of action. We're going to take a quick bathroom break--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: At ten o'clock, a bathroom break?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Quick bathroom break.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We need a pause.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello, everyone, and welcome back. We have returned from our break. Real fast, we had two winners. We had one winner from last week since we had no episode, so we did two this time in the chat. The winners are Super Gimpo Man, who won a flamebox elder hero vault from Wyrmwood. And we have a second winner, is Southern Dragon 22, won a purple heart dice box.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's the one that I have.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's that color right there, for one of the deckboxes. So Super Gimpo Man and Southern Dragon 22 congratulations, well done.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It does grant you cock lightning, that's true. It's like a 5th-level spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, guys, so, the dust of the battle settling, the plumes of smoke slowly beginning to dissipate as the fires burn out from the previous struggle. The remaining living soldiers begin to gather their dead and wounded. And you guys begin to reconvene as allies towards the broken front doors to the outside of Fort Daxio.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I search Xanthas' body.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You search his body?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll search the giant.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I scavenge from the ember-roc?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, if you want to.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Could I ask Pike to heal me a little bit, please?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, yeah. Where are you at?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, you know, like a two-digit number.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How many points do you have, Grog?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25 hitpoints on Grog.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I got nine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, he asked. Does that mean that something's going to happen right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need to sleep, let's all sleep. Let's go to sleep right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right now? It doesn't work that way. All right, so as you guys are looting, the giant has giant black iron plate mail on, which is very heavy, it is-- it's going to take a few hands to pull off.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not if we tagteam.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As well as her great maul, which is also very large.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Gauche.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And about 812 gold pieces.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll take those.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like so big that I couldn't even wield it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could hold it, but you couldn't wield it, yes. Sizewise, it's maybe about three feet taller than you, from head to pommel. And the weight of it is unwieldy for your size.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 30 points.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I heal him 30 points with my last...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You find on Xanthas-- you find 1,098 gold pieces.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll take that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You find a potion of superior healing that he didn't have a chance to use. And there appears to be a wand that is shattered.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Take it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm taking it, of course I'm taking it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks like it has broken, and there's a little bit of a burn mark on the wood the wand was crafted from.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I inspect it. It doesn't do anything when I inspect it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Make an arcana check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Take a look, Hermione.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But I'm doing it because Grog told me to, and he's brilliant.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Check out the brain on Vex.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Definitely busted. And it was once a wand.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Cool cool cool.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you sure it's not a twig?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I hate you so much, Sam. Nothing, continue.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He never saw the bottom of it. Until now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, not until now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, is that true?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. I've been focused on... other things.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I printed some extras for you, Matt. Like, sign them for fans... it's high derp.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I blame you, internet. You're partially responsible for this. Oh boy. Some things never die.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a legacy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is a legacy, it's true. It's pretty great. One of the downsides of having hundreds of hours of video of you on the internet is those are everywhere.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We've all made awful faces and said stupid things.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's wonderful. I'm glad you guys have come to enjoy it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They've all seen us pick our noses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Probably, yeah. Somebody do a supercut, please.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Too late, guys.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're a horrible person. I have two guns to fix at some point.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go ahead and make some repair checks while you're working on that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. Do I get a bonus if I'm not in the middle of combat, or is that still the same tinkering check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Same tinkering check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So number one, yes! That goes well, that's a 17. That was on Animus. And then Bad News, which is slightly easier to fix, does not fix.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bad News.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Bad News is broken.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Bad News, you're going to need supplies to fix.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to need to sit there with some money and spend some time with it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, Mom? I cleaned the dishes.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Did we loot the giant?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, the giant was looted. You're trying to carve something out of the ember-roc?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes I am. Nature check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make a nature check, with advantage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But with advantage, it is a 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It's hard to pull a lot from the body, because the nature of the ember-roc, as it passes away, parts of it begin to turn to ash, but you do manage to pull from a portion of its torso what's called ember-roc oil. It is a flammable liquid that burns like a napalm.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like napalm?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's worth about 750 gold, if you were to try and sell it. It's very volatile, depending on how you store it, just so you're aware.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Cool, man.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh man, drop some Mentos in there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Percy, do you have any vials left?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: In theory, I should have some vials left.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can it hold a gallon?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not a gallon's worth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not a gallon, but I just want a couple, and I hand a couple to Vex and Vax. Just a couple vials of the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you guys have a vial of ember-roc oil.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yep, nitroglycerin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kind of. In a way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You can either make a really great molotov cocktail, or maybe some flaming arrows.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not certain. The book that you have that details some of these creatures, the thing that you had found earlier in the campaign, it doesn't tell you details of how the actual liquid is triggered, it just says that it is fiery and burns very hot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "Talk angry."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: "Talk sweet."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. As you guys are taking this moment to figure this out, eventually you hear what sounds like the crumbling of stone, and a few rocks tumble out of the broken open entrance to the fortress, and you watch as a couple of guards begin to come out, their eyes wide. They look like they were in armor and ready to make the final stand. Among them, you see General Elle Gorgofon, the female head of this particular regiment of Fort Daxio, and Kima.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But what about Allura?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see her teeth are clenched, and there's still a shaking of rage in her fists, and what looks to be streaks of dried tears across her cheek. "Xanthas betrayed us all. He arrived alone, bloodied, asked for aid and protection. Since "Allura recognized him, we let him in. Stayed here for a short time, saying how bad things had become "in Emon, and spoke with Allura alone. Something sensitive. We found her ten minutes later. Come "with me."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you serious?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She steps over the stone and leads you inside of the fortress. She turns the corner, stops, staring into the room. As you guys approach, motions for you to follow her. You walk up to one of the small meeting chambers, the one that you met Elle with when you first arrived here. And as you begin to approach, Kima turns back and says, "It's okay. Friends are here." And you walk in and you see Allura sitting really scared in a corner in her robes, sitting in a chair with her knees pulled to her chest. Her eyes widen as she sees you all, and she gets up from her chair and runs over, and the person who's probably the first to walk in there would probably be Keyleth, at this point, and just wraps her arms around you and just holds you for a second and shakes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you okay? What happened? We thought you were dead for a second.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She backs away. (distressed sounds)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, fuck. Oh, fuck. What's your name? What's your name? She's been Feebleminded. I turn to Kima. Was it Feeblemind?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I-- I don't know what that is, I don't-- Can you help her?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes. It's a restoration spell.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. I'm going to cast a Greater Restoration on her. I have it. Can I-- well, I don't have any 5th-level left yet-- wow. I don't have any 5th-level left, but I have a seventh. Can I cast it at a seventh?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do have a seventh.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, can I cast it at that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, you can definitely cast it at a higher level. It doesn't affect it, but you can.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, no, it doesn't affect the power of the spell. It doesn't make it a more powerful spell.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: This is so stressful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's all good. So as you approach-- Kima, as you begin to walk forward, your hands begin to glow as you reach out, your holy symbol beginning to burn with a bright whitish-orange color that mingles with the red and gold of the armor across your chest. As the glow sparks in your fingers, she goes (gasps).

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's okay. It's okay. I'm going to help you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I try and calm her as best as I can to help Pike. Any assistance I can provide.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You are a godsend, my dear."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, I grab her and hug her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She pulls you in for a big hug and lifts you up off the ground for a second before-- "You're "heavy now." Puts you back down.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I just have so much armor on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That you do, that you do." As she pulls back, she looks at you all, and immediately, Grog and Vex, you feel yourselves pushed apart, as Kima rushes up and just grabs her around the side and says, "Don't do that again!" Holds her for a second. Allura just rubs her head and says, "I'm "sorry. I should have been careful. We needed allies, I didn't know--" And Kima says, "You shut "up," and she reaches up and gives her a kiss. She takes her and holds her to her chest. Allura holds her, and you hear Kima quietly sobbing for a moment, and she goes, "I-- well. It seems that "things have moved a bit quicker in your absence. I think it's time to find what we have at our "disposal and do what we can to finish this before it comes on us."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you receive any word back from the armies?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They're about a day south of Emon. Syngorn has returned. Mikael is leading them northward. I "haven't checked in. I'm sorry, I wanted-- I should have let you know. I couldn't, I didn't--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Allura, I'm sorry. We should have been those allies, here by your side, and we weren't, and I'm sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It seems you found what you went for. Let's hope it makes the difference."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes. It seems it already has.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have something else. Where's the body?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What body?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can interrogate him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Xanthas?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh yeah, we can!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I believe he's still on the wall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Get that fucker!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just because he's dead doesn't mean he doesn't have to talk to us now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll go get him. I'll go get him. I go up and find the corpse of shitbag and bring it back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Allura bumps back and rubs her shoulder. "I know." "You know." Kima turns around and walks out of the room in a little bit of a huff, her lower lip quivering. Allura now smiles for the first time since you came in. "All right. If you can, do your thing."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Should I put him on the ground or just hold him? I'll hold him up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you bring back, dragging this bloody body, leaving this trail through the Fort. There's bits of rock and rubble around, and you're like, "Oops!" Drag him over them as you go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Whoops, sorry, ooh, that's pouring out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So that is a 3rd-level spell.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Because of the necklace, I have one 3rd-level spell left. Because I've used three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Great.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What are we asking this guy?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How many questions do we get?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We get three questions.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What are we asking?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Can ask the corpse up to five questions.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why are you such a dick?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You were always mean to us. Why?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You've been working with Thordak. What are his weaknesses?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What did he want?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The defenses of the city.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just be aware of the rule, too. The corpse is under no compulsion to offer a truthful answer if you are hostile to it and it recognizes you as an enemy.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So maybe just face it towards me?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, 'cause you're nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can also discern lies, if you get a high enough insight. This is still-- this isn't free answers. This is still an interrogation.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What if we put a bag over his head?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who would he trust?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Lizard-skinned man.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yeah. Could you make yourself look like a lizardman?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, sure, or I could make someone who we know talk--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But you're so good with words.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, but I mean, I'm saying-- who would he trust? I can make that person, and I can make that person talk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, technically, it's Pike asking the questions, since it is her spell, so whatever questions you ask have to go through her.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We have the Hat of Disguise. Can you give her the Hat of Disguise?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What if you made yourself one of the lizardpeople, and then you had her down and you were using her to get info for Thordak?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think he'll know that he's dead.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You think he won't care?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So the trickery, I think it may be-- I would say it's probably either an appeal or a threat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's try the appeal.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wipeout!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's try to make him like us.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Let's try to make him like us. Like we were a friend, we're sad that he died.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Especially me.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: God, okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we know anything about his family? Because we could always play bad cop, too, and threaten his family.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys have not engaged him beyond a brief fuck-you-type conversation in and out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I will threaten him if necessary, but we can try the carrot before the stick.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, so what are we asking? What are his weaknesses? Has Thordak had a visit from Greenie? Raishan?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How did they find out where we were?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are there secret entrances into Emon?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, that's a good one!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What are the strengths of their army? What are their weaknesses?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What does Thordak ultimately want?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who does Thordak trust the most?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Who in the city, especially.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, who in the city does Thordak trust?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do we want to ask him what he knows about the Clasp's activity?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're up to 20 questions, now?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Four, we've got four!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Also, other questions may lead to other questions.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, so that's good. Let's start with this, and then we'll see where it goes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, what are you doing? Casting the spell?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so as Grog throws it on the ground, skids for a second, you begin casting the spell. As you're casting it, Kima walks up and kicks it one more time and then walks away. You finish-- it takes you-- it's a very quick action, but as you finish, you watch as the air itself seems to form this mist around the corpse, and the mist absorbs into the body. All of a sudden the jaw opens. Air fills its chest and the head leans up, the eyes still staring off into the distance, but it seems to be addressing you, Pike.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where's the beef?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So we know that you've been working with Thordak and I have some questions. Has Thordak had a visit from Raishan?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (quietly) Persuasion check!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The head creaks a little bit as it tilts upward. You can hear the unnatural puppeteering of the body trying to speak, not the spirit but the body's memory. "He's had no visits. He speaks "through his crystals."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, we knew that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (quietly) How did they find out where we were? How did he find Fort Daxio?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well he speaks to his crystals.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But we don't know, like--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, some dickhead ratted us out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Who?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And then I will let you go in peace. How did you know that we were at Fort Daxio?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Naught but two days before, maybe less, a scouting party left Emon. Saw activity at the "fort. And when they checked, they saw you. And you were marked."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can you insight check a dead person?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, can we insight check him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Vox Machina, I'm assuming, considering you left our--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get the sense that might be what he's referring to, and you get the sense that long ago when you guys were high up on the broom looking out towards Emon, you missed seeing something that was possibly--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I remember that, we didn't roll high enough on perception. I rolled a 24 on insight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So far none of the questions seem to be probing too deeply and he seems to be on the level with Pike.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do you know of any secret entrances into Emon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Secrets. Just the Traverse Junction."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Traverse Junction. We've heard of that before.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, we have.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's where he used to work. That's the--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The teleportation circle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Or the tunnels beneath. But those are where the Clasp reign dominion."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Two more.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Who within the city still fights-- who within the city still fights against the dragon? Who will be our allies, who can we trust?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a whole lot. Who within the city fights against Thordak?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Are we looking for allies, like who doesn't--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well we want to know who Thordak trusts and we want to know who Thordak doesn't--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We've only got two questions left.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thordak doesn't trust anybody.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, the Clasp is clearly working for him now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA, TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well he said the tunnels the Clasp "reigns dominion," so--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's where they-- that's theirs.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But they might still be resisting. I mean the question-- asking this shithead who still resists within the city will answer a lot of questions.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Yeah yeah yeah. Ask that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Who still in the city resists-- I have one job! I feel so-- (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can you understand a word coming out of my mouth?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Computer! Who still in the city resists Thordak?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There are a few groups. But beneath the city the resistance builds. We've tried to smoke "them out but they keep moving."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispers) So the Clasp is still resisting.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Could be.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I insight check him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kind of hard to read for a dead body, but seems to be legit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: On the up and up?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We have one more question, but is there anything else?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Anything else? Allies?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like, who does Thordak trust the most?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or what does Thordak fear?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, yeah. I like that one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Probably, probably. What about Greyskull Keep? Because there was a tunnel from Greyskull Keep into the city.

lines.name: TALIESIN, ASHLEY
lines.text: He might not know about that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is there anything or anyone that Thordak fears the most?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thordak has no fear. Thordak rules all."

lines.name: LIAM, TRAVIS
lines.text: Insight check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Two.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait wait wait.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can't all make insight checks to cover for the last person failing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Four.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, but I've been insight checking the whole damn time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know, I know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But I get plus two so it's actually four, Matt, so spill his secrets.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25. Seems to be telling the truth from what he knows. You get the sense that in a strange way, while he was an intelligent fellow, he was also kind of a sniveling patsy. And the way that Kima's talked off the cuff since this began to happen, since you began to prepare for the corpse, she seems to have a history, or at least her and Allura both have a history with him in the city, and he was basically a spineless coward.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I mean, it makes sense, to a certain point. When you have a big enough ego you don't have any more fears, I guess.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are we done with him?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't think he's going to talk anymore. We should kill him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The spell at this point has subsided and the last bit of energy and mist that had entered the body slowly drifts out of the open mouth and nose, (gasps), and the corpse goes cold.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You guys can fill me in, in a bit. And I grab his collar and drag him outside with the rest of the bodies and start overseeing the burning of the bodies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. And there are large pyres for a lot of the lizardmen corpses and wyvern pieces, they've all been thrown. All the rest of the dead soldiers have been rounded up and have blankets and cloth, whatever's nearby, to haul them over the wall and begin to recount who fell among them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) Can I fly up in the air and see if I can spot the boys?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have the stone, you can find the boys with the stone. If you would like to use the stone to pick up the boys--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Here. I give the stone to Vex.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You concentrate on the stone for a minute. Your form begins to shift. Your physicality begins to almost liquefy and then swirls and vanishes from view. You open your eyes, and you're in shadow. You're in shade. You're in this little nook at the side of the rock crevasse, and you hear two voices go (surprised gasp). And you look immediately to your left and you see Hunin and Kyor are both there. One of them has dropped the crystal on the ground--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't drop it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Sorry! Sorry!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, no. That's okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It started glowing and I got scared."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I put it in my pocket. I'm just so glad you're safe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm glad you're safe too. Is everything okay?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Everything is wonderful. Do you want to come back to the fort? All the bad guys are dead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They both look at each other. "Okay." And Hunin takes Kyor by the hand and they both walk after you as you make your way back towards Fort Daxio.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The rest of you--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I bamf Trinket out and let them ride on Trinket.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay! They both climb up after an awkward five minutes of trying to convince them that it's okay. Trinket nudges them a little bit and they get up on top.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's got a taste for the celestial blood.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're both riding on top of him and he's proudly walking. (bear grunts)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Babysitter Trinket.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I say we sleep here for the evening. We also can go through whatever materials the invading army left behind. Cannibalize them for our own. I suppose we can eat.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I talk to Allura, I guess.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is she there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, she's nearby.
