She was helping gather the dead, and she was talking with General Elle and getting the ideas of what the next course of action is and as you approach her she turns to you and as she recognizes your approach and goes, "Looking to probably make a jaunt to Whitestone "shortly and see what we've gathered on that end. I can bring everyone with me if you'd like. You can "stay here if you like, but..."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We should not leave them again.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I would feel terrible leaving everyone again after we gathered everyone. Who cast that spell on you? Feeblemind, that's very high level magic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It is, and it was beyond the capability of that... man. But he pulled out a small wooden "trinket in front of me which shattered and sent me into my stupor."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was Xanthas?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes."

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: He had that wand that shattered.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did anyone escape the fight to go report back to home?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's why I don't know if it-- whatever.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So does the plan stay the same?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean we can come back and stage here but we can't leave anybody here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Say that again?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We can stage here, but we can't leave anybody here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, we can't leave anybody here. But it's interesting. If we're lucky, he's going to send more troops to attack and we can be long gone by then.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Be long gone? What happened to using this as our base?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They know about it!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We can stage here. We can rally here. We can't leave anybody here now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can't leave anybody here. We either abandon or we rally at this point. And now that we know there are forces underneath Emon, that is good news. That is very good news.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Was it only the wyverns and the lizardmen that attacked?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't think it was sent as a full-scale assault "more than it was, at this stage, just enough to harry and see what was here."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who was in contact with Xanthras? Xanthras? Xanthas? Xanthas. Who was in contact with Xanthas?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my lord.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Zenith.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Zenith. Who was in contact with Xena the Warrior Princess?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Xanthas. "None of us were in contact with him. I hadn't seen him, probably in the better part of a year."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then how did he know?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They saw us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They said the scouts spotted us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. They spotted us with scouts.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You had your hood up, it's okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What of the elves? Did I hear correctly that Syngorn has sent forces?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "As far as I know and the information I have received from Syngorn, they've taken the rest of "the troops under General Mikael Daxio as well as the forces of Syngorn and they're marching towards "Emon, one day out."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One day out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (groans) Oh my god.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We could meet them at Emon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, what?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're marching towards Emon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No. Wait, what?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. So they're a day away.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that true?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They're making their way northward, towards Daxio."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, to us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, to Daxio.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They're a day out from Emon, but they have to-- it's in the pathway."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's fine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We want them here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's not okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, where else are we gonna meet?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, if they have to go through the battleground--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They don't have to go through, they can go around it; they're not idiots.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They will, and in doing so, it's about a four-day journey on foot for those troops to make "it here to Fort Daxio."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. So we have four days.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We don't have four days.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would volunteer that we should head south and meet them where they are.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: On the outskirts of Emon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep. Better than being here, 'cause we let people get away.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're sitting ducks here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So we're gonna march all the troops out of here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All the troops, which is like, 20 people left.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You gotta reposition once you give your position away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you as that, Elle pulls forward, her helmet under her arm. "Last count, looks like we "have 55 strong surviving."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we're gonna march all 55.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Out of 200 that were here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Remember that the original plan was for Thordak to know where we were, and send Raishan to kill us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where the fuck is Raishan? Where is Raishan?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, we sent Raishan back to Whitestone with Asum and then we left, so for all we know Raishan's there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Allura, you were talking about going to Whitestone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That was my plan, yes."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And what were all of your goals, again?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All of your goals?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What did you want to do in Whitestone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's a very broad question."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We need to meet up with Raishan. We need to find a rally point.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Open a magic cafe.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: These things have to change.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We've an army close to Emon. We do have to talk to Raishan, though. I think we should go to Whitestone immediately, talk to her, and figure out if there's any news with her.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She was coming back there, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, is that where she is?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Potentially

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But be ready to move to the army from Syngorn, quickly. It might be our best shot, our only shot?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we march these 55 blokes to the south while we go to Whitestone? I'll stay and march the troops while you guys go back to Whitestone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, we need to rest!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, hang on, hang on. What time of day is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point it's probably a little later afternoon; you're maybe an hour, hour and a half from sunset.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. We can gather our most elite.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It started really strong.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can get a decent amount of people through if we Teleport Via Plants very quickly, but not all of them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think the 55 will be okay if we send them off into the wilderness.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Here's the thing, 55 people walking near Emon is not very covert. And it's clear that there are scouts everywhere; Fort Daxio was off the map until we showed up. No one was watching it until we showed up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But we are out of time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But we are what Thordak is watching.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So we have to be very careful of where we go and what we do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We put everyone at risk no matter where we are.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No matter what, there's not gonna be another attack on Daxio in the next 24 hours. So we can go back to Whitestone, we can spend the night here and then go back, or go back now and spend a night and then bamf right back before there's any attack.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or we can send half the troops, as many as we can, tonight, stay here, and in the morning send the rest, and we can go with them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To where Syngorn's army is?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But we're gonna have to bring those guys back out here, right? I mean, we're gonna have to march with the 55 guys. So why send them through to Whitestone? Why not sleep tonight, deep within the fort, wake up in the morning?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They rest up, we go--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To Whitestone? Get info, come back tomorrow if we need to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but we need to rest now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can't get 55 guys in the mansion, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The mansion, sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But the mansion can't travel.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Unless we spend the night here first before going to Whitestone bright and early in the morning.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, maybe we should do that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We need to rest anyway. I'm at nine hit points.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you use the mansion tonight?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I can't.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So we sleep within the fort. Deep within the fort.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's left of the fort? What's undestroyed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Other than the front doors, which need to be repaired, and right now there isn't anything beyond just putting things in the way because of the impact of the giant. The outer wall's taken quite a bit of damage, but the fortress itself, for the most part, is standing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll be okay for eight hours of sleep, and then we can go to Whitestone, ask around, come back if we need to. Let's go to sleep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe we should have someone on watch.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, it is a fort.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll put the guards on watch.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They have a system.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: General Elle says, "I can do that; don't worry. And don't make fun of my horns!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm not, I'm not! I'm just saying that's the sound they'll make if they come.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's a very specific sound my soldiers are trained to hear."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Of course, if you need us, you do blow that horn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: 'Cause we will hear it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes you will."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I need to sleep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's find a bedroom and lay the fuck down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we sleeping in the fort?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is there a room with a big fireplace in it, and we can all just have a sleepover?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to, there is a hearth in one of the common-room areas.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there somewhere to clean up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They do. There are a few bathrooms that can be...

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Are there hides and things, like, fluffies we can lay on?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's nothing terribly comfortable, but there are blankets. It does get cold this far north. It's not in the winter months anymore, but just south of the Cliffkeep Mountains in this area, it does get kinda chilly, so there are blankets, there are hides, there are things to keep warm in.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, you just got used as a weapon; you might want a shower.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Ah, I like the dirt.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm gonna go soak.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm gonna crash as soon as I find something fluffy to fall on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The food is meager but serviceable, and you all find yourselves an evening's rest. Unperturbed, a good nine, ten hours pass of intense sleep as you all are sore, you are all exhausted-- although you do recover your point of exhaustion, Scanlan, that's gone-- as do you, from your frenzied rage-- You all come to consciousness shortly after daybreak, I'd say; you got to bed probably right around sunset, or a little bit past sunset, so it's just starting to get the sun over the mountains. The day is yours.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, we said what we were gonna do; we're gonna go to Whitestone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's what we said we were gonna do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Kiki, set us up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have any trees here?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Allura raises her hand. "I can still take us there."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck, yeah, that's right!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That was the plan, but... I mean, it's up to you; we could find a tree, I suppose."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, but I have two extra guys with us right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh... I cannot do that, unfortunately."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, you know what? I can get us there, and Allura can get us back on the same day.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What are we getting at Whitestone?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're gonna talk to Raishan.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: See if Raishan's there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is Raishan there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Potentially!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I haven't seen Raishan. We've been at the fort this entire time, waiting for your return."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And she was getting Asum. You know what? Yeah. Let's go. All right!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys make your way towards Whitestone Castle; the guards greet you and lead you inside. Within minutes, Cassandra has been summoned down and says, "Percival, thank God you've returned."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 'Thank God'? All right, why? What's happened?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You're alive, that's--"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh! Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Look, the last time you left, you did not come back in the best of places! I'm just "beginning to think--"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I just assume that everything is going to be bad news for the next-- Just assume that I'm going to assume everything is terrible every time I see you for the next two months. Yes, we're alive.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Speaking of Asum."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Come."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, Cassandra, are there rooms for these new guests?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Who are these?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're the best foster mom ever!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have them written down somewhere, but I can't find it in my notes!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We met them at Booty, they're totally celestial--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're totally great, man!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pumpkin latte...

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They can just crash on our couch for a few months.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch their noses scrunch a little as you entirely butcher their names.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They have, like, angel blood! (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What are their names again? I can't find it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hunin and Kyor.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hunin and... Kyor?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. K-Y-O-R.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you see all of this?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Got it. Angel babies. Writing it down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not to worry."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll put them to work. They will be useful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Fine."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't we give them a day off?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How old are they?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're in their late teens. Mid- to late teens.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't we just give them some schooling?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess they're about the same age as Cassandra, then, huh?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cassandra's a little bit older. Though she doesn't act it. She acts, like, fifteen years her senior. And always has.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes. All right. Asum?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you guys head upstairs with her; she leads you-- oh, no. She does not lead you upstairs. She leads you downstairs, through the tunnels, towards the ziggurat. And as she's walking along, she says, "Well. We've managed to relocate the meeting room. And it required a bit "of careful discussion as to our current allies. As well, the transport was a bit awkward for Asum and "his companion, and the dragon cannot maintain her usual form around the ziggurat, so just be ready."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I assumed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys make your way into the ziggurat chamber, you can see already there's the platform on the outside of the central area where the new situation is set. And you see there's a table, and you can already hear discussion off that way, and there are a few servants that are bringing food and drinks up there as part of the morning breakfast for those who are in their meeting. And you see there, right on the outskirts of the table, wrapped and curled up, a gargantuan green dragon with its head resting on its claws that is listening in on part of the conversation.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, damn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, little guy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, things have not been going well on our end; how about yours?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To Cassandra?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, to the room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To the room? Okay, so as you head up to the platform, everyone pauses and looks over. Asum stands up-- you can see now, this being the real Asum-- acid-scarred across the face, just as Raishan's form arriving was, and sitting on the opposite end of Raishan, and you can see there's this very much kind of-- especially as a master of spies and information, understands the importance of, you know, strange bedfellows, given the circumstances in war, but is still not at ease and doesn't seem to keep-- always has one eye on the dragon at all times, but gives a nod. "It's good "to see that you're all alive. And we have much to discuss. Please, come sit. You've met Brom "before." And you look over and you can see Brom Goldhand, the same square-jawed, shorter, black unkempt hair, the cleric of Ioun that was and is part of the council. However, the skin is covered in burn scars. Like, the face, some of the features are kind of missing. All the exposed elements beyond the armor are just burned. But he stands and bows to everyone. "It is good to see "you all alive." He sits down at the table, Cassandra takes a seat. Raishan has said nothing, is just watching you all as you sit down, gives a nod. Allura flanks behind you. Kima has been asked not to attend. (chuckles) Allura sits down on-- there's a few stools, whatever chairs were available were brought in here, so it's a ramshackle meeting room, given how many butts have to sit around this area.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll stand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you are all here. "So. I've been told that you were at Daxio and gathering other allies "about. Please, let us know what the circumstance is from your end of things. Things are not as well "from ours."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That sucks to hear.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Daxio was discovered and attacked prematurely.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Wonderful."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A group has already-- a small strike group came and attacked the fort, did damage-- I wouldn't necessarily call it significant damage--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But wiped out a large percentage of the force there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Decimated it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 75 percent.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Broken clock. That's a very good guess, Grog. I've completely lost my train of thought.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Approximately.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The problem is that we've summoned many of our allies to Fort Daxio and they are currently in transit to that current location.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But Daxio's been attacked."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now, by the might of the Wounded Mistress of "Knowledge, Ioun, in the channels in which we speak, that is all the information I have. I hope "it's helped in some way." And he sits down in his chair and clutches his holy symbol.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, my god.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This changes much.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, it does.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Dragon. You're awfully quiet. We need to act. What do you advise?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Distraction. Attack. Confusion. Chaos, striking towards the center of the city is the best chance "we have. If we have a way in, to break the Cloudtop, we can battle it there, draw it from its "lair. Force it to possibly rescind within, and have our final battle there. Or, if luck is with "us, finish it on the streets itself, and discover whatever it is it's keeping while it lies dead and "burning in the street."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You say "we"?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You'll fight alongside us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What have I to gain by watching you do this yourself?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I imagine whatever he's building. What is he building, do you know?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have no idea. He lets nothing within his sanctum."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Insight check!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an insight check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come on, high insight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What was that? That's okay, 23.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And the memory of Dennis.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And Coachella.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We should also probably tell them about Xanthas, that we did have...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tell who about Xanthas?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The room.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. Well, there was a guy named Xanthas, we killed him, he was a dick, what's there to tell?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There is worth telling, is that he had already turned and was working for the Cinder King.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Keyleth.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And he is now no longer with us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Brom? Do you know Osysa? The sphinx?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thinks for a minute. "I do not know of this sphinx. I am sorry."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's a temple to Ioun in Vasselheim.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a temple to Ioun? In Vasselheim?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That is good. Many temples have fallen and hidden through the years since our "mistress was wounded."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You would have no way of contacting it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This was one such temple."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, that's right, this was a temple to Ioun, we knew that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right, right, okay. So wait, Tharizdun?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Tharizdun, the Chained Oblivion."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that another god?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, a very evil one. Sealed, chained away. Nothing you need to worry about. Not in "the midst of this."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to have to go to Emon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure. We'll rally all the troops outside and maybe go in through the tunnels? I guess when we rally the troops we can form a more specific plan.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There will be several armies, we will have allies. There will be troops to create distractions, there will be troops that go into the tunnels, there will probably be a group of troops that go in to try and pierce the lair. We will create chaos.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh, did the airship ever show up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cassandra says "Yes, the airship has been told to make its way towards Fort Daxio."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh that's good! Oh wait. Well, you know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It could actually pick up the people there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we want to do a last trip to Vasselheim to talk to Osysa or... since we got all the Vestiges?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To do what? It's not all the Vestiges in the world?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, all the ones she told us about.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She was like, if you get these then I will help you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh really? She said that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did she say that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did she say that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did she say that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we remember her saying anything like that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well you didn't learn about the Vestiges until it was--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was from her hubby, her boyfriend.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, Kamaljiori, it was, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, that name.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The one that said a name is earned.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we need to go to him?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a sphinx.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Was there anybody that said they would help us once we got all the Vestiges? I feel like they said that once we got all the Vestiges we'd be like extra awesome.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We are extra awesome.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, yeah, yeah, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, there's some-- I feel like there's not some sort of Voltron thing considering there are more vestiges in the world.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You lack imagination.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Quick, let's try to fit all of our Vestiges together right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, let's do it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I just stab at Pike.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ow ow ow ow.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't feel anything.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does anything happen when they're all touching? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take all the Vestiges and and smush them into a pile on the central table and all the rest of the council kind of--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, it's not magic down here

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: --look curiously and they all gather around as you begin to place them all into the central area, kind of overlapping in almost the shape of a person who is built of Vestiges. You put them each one down, their kind of magical essence clinging with the surface of the stone table.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's no magic down here!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I just lie down across the entire table.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, the sound of them impacting. They all sit there on the table.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They don't stick to my armor somehow?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You gotta say a word.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone's kind of standing there watching quietly as nothing happens, and then Asum goes, "All right then, um."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe you should put your armor back on, Pike.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I mean, I have underclothes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, we had that discussion. You need things beneath the armor or it'll cut you to shit.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Just like bareback armor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'd be a bad idea. You'd get pinched in all the wrong places.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We do have-- Well, we do have our own tunnel into the city that we can show-- Is anybody using our tunnels into the city?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Clasp? Oh you mean our specifically? Last time I scryed there, there was someone in the keep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you scry there now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, weren't they--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yeah, Keyleth! Can you scry? Not down here. We have to leave the ziggurat.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've got the Scrying Eye.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If the keep is clear, that does give us access. Possibly clear access.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We could bamf into the keep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, that just gets us inside the wall. That doesn't-- that's it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's not nothing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The sewers is where we need to be.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What about-- What about Cashew? What about Shaun? What about Zahra?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Cashew's kinda mad at us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I'm sure he is, but this the end of times.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cassandra kind of raises her hand and goes, "Kashaw and Zahra, they are ready to go whenever you are ready."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sweet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Shaun?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Shaun we've -- we're trying to decide if it is best to keep someone here to maintain the "barrier, or if we are going all in on this, if we just send everyone out there "and leave the city defenseless."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think it's best to leave him here, especially since that was his plan all along, because he is a dominator of all worlds and a god among men.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's your choice which one of us to take."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can Gilmore transport people like you can?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I believe he can, yes."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I like Gilmore.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: For what? For keeping him alive or taking him?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, bringing him with. Dude, he turned that guy into a little pretzel dough ball. Just because he fucked with him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But Allura can teleport us back and forth.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, so can he.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can he?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's what he just said.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Allura signed up for this fight.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, Allura, what do you want to do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's interesting. I have a lot of personal history with Thordak. I feel a deep sense of "responsibility for all of this that still eats away at me. And because of that a part of me "really longs to be there with all of you, putting this dark and fiery chapter to rest. On the other "hand, having already faced him, and having an inkling of what he is now, every part of me wants "to run away. Screaming."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But you have faced him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And that's invaluable.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I lost many good people in doing so."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And we're going to lose many more.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Most likely. So the choice is yours, Vox Machina."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No offense. You're lovely and very strong.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch her audibly (sighs).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is that relief? That was relief.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's both. It's a lot of things. It's an emotionally conflicted exhale, but it is a relief of tension regardless.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I disagree. You fought this fucking thing before. You know him. That is invaluable. You have more experience than we do. You're wiser than us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Scanlan? What do you think?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think we should decide this the way we always do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Coin toss?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's D&D, man.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's put it to a vote.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Experience. Experience.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Gilmore?

lines.name: SAM, ASHLEY, TRAVIS
lines.text: Hell yeah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, just us. Allura?

lines.name: SAM, TALIESIN, LIAM, MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But that was three and three. What'd you vote?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I voted Gilmore.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's four.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know what would happen. So: Gilmore, Gilmore...

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Four and three.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Gilmore doesn't want to go either.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Neither of them want to go, but she's so scared now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "Allura! I vote for Gilmore." (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Unless Gilmore feels like volunteering.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Allura, I have had destiny pushed upon me since birth. What do you feel is right? Because I'm not sure what to believe anymore.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Make this decision for us!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Make this decision for us!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, let's leave it to the dice!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Allura turns to you, kind of takes the side of your head in her hands and says, "And in "becoming a leader, you've been put in a position to make very difficult choices. As you grow as a "leader, you'll have to make many more. This is not my choice to make."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But in many ways you've been our leader-- (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We already voted, people! And Gilmore won!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, actually, Allura won.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Who do you choose?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, it's four to three.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, then, it's covered. Then it's done.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Keyleth."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Unless you do what Laura and Marisha did and do the exact opposite after the vote. Right? Come on, Allura.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, are you trying to use this as an allegory?.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No. That's just a throwback to, what episode...?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, Raishan picks up and goes--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh. Clarota?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, god, at the rate this is going, I think perhaps neither of them are going to make it."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Sorry about that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The survivor goes to Emon!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, is Gilmore strong enough?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, is he strong enough? Is he all right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll rest him up; he'll be great. Pretzel dough ball. It's gonna be amazing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Last I checked, he's handling the barrier, but he's a capable man. May need a bit of rest, "but so did you."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Quick stop to get his parents' permission, then we're on our way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Allura.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, what? What happened?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's talking to her.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're taking Gilmore.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, she's talking to her!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's not trying to take her. She's talking about something else.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jesus Christ.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are a few chuckles at the table now, as everyone is just dumbfoundedly watching you all argue over who to take for five minutes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vox Machina.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vox Machina.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: In many ways, I feel we are walking down the path you've already walked. In that case, I feel it's time for new blood, and we've been with Gilmore since the beginning. We need you as an ally back here, we'll keep you on the sidelines as an oracle, and we'll take Gilmore to be by our side.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, yeah, that's what we said already.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Look, he set me up to make the call, okay! I was trying to follow through, Jesus.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You got it, Keyleth.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Smash cut to Gilmore saying, "No fucking way!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And then she adjusts her collar a bit and raises her chin. "And so it is. Vox Machina, we gather our forces. Put your minds together. Decide on "your plan of action, your means of attack. Soon we begin the assault on Emon." And that's where we'll end our episode for tonight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: At dawn, we vote!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I demand a recount! In Pennsylvania and Florida specifically.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys, thank you very much. We're on the home stretch, it looks like.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Man. All right. You guys have a week to plan amongst yourselves what to do next time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we assuming that we're sleeping after this? Because god damn.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We already just slept.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's right, because we bamfed to Whitestone. Never mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, yes, you've only used your spell there. We will unfortunately not have a Travis Willingham next week, or Ashley Johnson.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh fuck. It's going to be an empty bench over here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (gasps)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Gathering?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are gathering all your allies.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As in, like, the Insane Clown Posse is coming?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah man! The Dark Carnival's here! (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Next week on Critical Role.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just start spraying Faygo all over you guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, it's happening next week? We're going into battle? We don't have Travis and Ashley?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Shit's happening.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Dude, that city's probably like the nine circles of Hell, we're not just going to get there, fast track to Thordak.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay okay okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you got Lin Manuel next week, I will kill you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, it's not, don't say-- no it's not.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I wish, I wish, that'd be great.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm just putting it out there, I don't want to have to kill you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, cool.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you, Loot Crate!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you Loot Crate, again, for being a great sponsor. Thank you guys so much for watching tonight, we'll see you Tuesday at Talks Machina, and Thursday for the continuation of this climactic downwards spiral into ancient red dragon territory.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This bullet-proof think-tank.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [music]
